900521030.baseFlair_: It does not speak, for a monster has no words. However, seen somewhere in its eyes is melancholic sorrow.
900521030.evoFlair_: You cannot speak, for the towering monster stands right before you. However, heard somewhere in its roars is heartrending anguish.

900524010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an allied follower and enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
900524010.baseFlair_: If you don't wish to kill me, allow me to change your mind! —Fran, Monster Girl

900534040.baseFlair_: I'm also gonna fight! I'm done crying, and I'm done watching other people cry. Just try and do something mean. I'll stop you—you can bet on it!

900534050.baseEffect_:
Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
900534050.baseFlair_: Um, I can fight too... I used to be really weak... and I couldn't do anything. But I'm different now. I think... I've changed. And I'm not gonna lose to you. 'Cause I want to win!

101511120.baseFlair_: All this poor creature wanted was another hug from its master. A demon granted it eternal life in order to fulfill that final wish.
101511120.evoFlair_: Eternal life comes at a price: one's flesh and blood, one's feelings, one's memories. The skull beast could not even remember its old master and was condemned to spreading death for all eternity.

104511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
104511020.baseFlair_: The moon and life both wane. But don't you think that's what makes it so elegant?
104511020.evoFlair_: Both the moon and life wane before long. But don't you think it's how you wane that counts?

108511030.baseFlair_: They say nothing short of dying can fix being dumb. But dying sure didn't fix that knuckleheaded son of mine. —Words of an elderly woman
108511030.evoFlair_: First my socks go missing, and then the dishes start breaking. It's a pain in the neck, all right. But it takes me back to the old days, and that's fine by me. —Words of an elderly woman

113511010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +5/+5 and 3 shadows.
Last Words: Gain 1 shadow.
113511010.baseFlair_: I'll put in my hours, but don't expect me to clock in any overtime. I have things to do at home... Not that you should concern yourself over that.
113511010.evoFlair_: I'll put in my hours, but don't expect me to clock in any overtime. What... I dropped something, you say? O-oh, that's the HaZeus fanfic I wrote! Y-you're a fan too? Omigosh, let's gush! HaZeus or Zeudes? I just can't choose my OTP!

900511010.baseFlair_: Though dead, he continues to fight. Though nothing but a bundle of dry bones, he continues to thirst for blood.
900511010.evoFlair_: Battles bring death, and death brings evil spirits—the evil spirits that possess souls tainted by hatred, turning them into pitiful shuffling skeletons.

900511020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Banish this follower when it leaves play or when your turn ends.
900511020.baseFlair_: An evil soul rising forth from the very depths of the underworld.
900511020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Banish this follower when it leaves play or when your turn ends.
900511020.evoFlair_: A hateful soul rising forth from the very depths of the underworld.

101521010.baseFlair_: No one can predict what will happen on the battlefield. Sometimes experienced soldiers die, and sometimes their skeletons keep walking onward. You have to fight them all the same.
101521010.evoFlair_: Departed souls are tough, so there's no point in fighting them. The best option is to turn and run. But what if the skeleton you're facing is a friend who's supposed to be dead? It's your duty as a friend to cut it down.

114521020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
114521020.baseFlair_:
A hound's distant baying echoes through the netherworld. A patchwork dog bounds toward you.
"That pooch always has candy in his mouth. Seems his master used to give him toys shaped like that. Maybe rebirth doesn't change your personality all that much."
114521020.evoFlair_:
Resurrected creatures don't sleep. The faithful dog waits patiently, its round eyes filled with hope.
"How about that. Don't usually catch this pooch sittin' down on the job. Seems the lord found his master for him. I guess rebirth got him his happy ending."

115531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Union Burst (10): Put a Pudding Time into your hand.
115531010.baseFlair_: Ooooh! Wooooh! I'm a scaaary ghooost who sends all the little kids running! Give me pudding or I'll haaauuunt yooouuu!
115531010.evoFlair_: I don't remember how I became a ghost. At first I thought I should go toward the light, but once I tasted pudding, I changed my mind!

711531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Union Burst (10): Put a Pudding Time into your hand.
711531010.baseFlair_: Ooooh! Wooooh! I'm a scaaary ghooost who sends all the little kids running! Give me pudding or I'll haaauuunt yooouuu!
711531010.evoFlair_: I don't remember how I became a ghost. At first I thought I should go toward the light, but once I tasted pudding, I changed my mind!

109541030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve all other allied followers. Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
At the end of your turn, give all evolved allied followers Last Words: Draw a card.
109541030.baseFlair_: Want me to divine your future? My predictions are never wrong, you know! In fact, I can even tell you the exact moment you're gonna die. Tee hee!
109541030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all evolved allied followers Last Words: Draw a card.
109541030.evoFlair_: Since you've called upon me, I'll give you a special fortune! Don't you worry, my divination's always on point! I can even change how you're gonna die. Tee hee!

900541040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
900541040.baseFlair_: Ruff 'em up! No matter what kinda soul it is, we'll give 'em the ol' one-two bark n' snap!
900541040.evoFlair_:
Charon: Hehe... I hear she likes it when you pet her.
Orthrus: I-if you try it, you'll lose a finger!

900541050.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900541050.baseFlair_: Hound 'em to death! We'll round up all the souls an' put 'em in the dog pound!
900541050.evoFlair_:
Charon: Hehe... He's so fluffy I could die.
Orthrus: Yeah, but he bites...

101514010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Draw 2 cards.

109514010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Draw 2 cards.
109514010.baseFlair_: I'm not done with you just yet.

110514010.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Enhance (5): Then destroy that follower.

115514010.baseEffect_: Burial Rite: Put a random Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand. If Burial Rite was performed with a follower with an original attack or defense of 1, put 2 Shadowcraft followers into your hand instead.
115514010.baseFlair_:
Long, long ago, the demons began their march, we know not where. They say those demons are marching still.
—Demonic Procession, Hyakki-Yagyo

103524010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 1 defense. If you have at least 8 shadows, you can perform Necromancy (8) to destroy an enemy follower with 2 defense or more instead.
103524010.baseFlair_: What a tiny, pitiful, and altogether lovely soul.

107524010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Summon a Zombie.
107524010.baseFlair_: "We'll fight together in the next life as well, of course?" —A Zombie's Grave

114524010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, Reanimate (4).
114524010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the shambling corpse discovered her kindness in his grave, he saw a deathly, necrotic aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who desire life.

111534010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Remove all effects from an allied follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Enhance (4): Remove all effects from all followers except changes to their attack or defense instead.

112534010.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower the following effect: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (4): Give all allied followers that effect instead.
112534010.baseFlair_: I find myself unable to cut through the bodies of my relatives. Not sure if it's their memories that keep me from completing the slice, or just the rigor mortis. —Necromancer

900534010.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+0 to an allied follower.
Necromancy (4): Give that follower Rush.
900534010.baseFlair_:
The vessels of the living are full.
Crude, earthen cups tempting the god of death to drink.
Pour, then! Brim over and descend into madness.

900544010.baseFlair_: Ruff! I'll drag you right to the pits of the underworld!

900544020.baseFlair_: Ruff! Time to tear your soul into little shreds!

900544040.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Deal 5 damage instead.
900544040.baseFlair_: Use my knowledge to live for the moment. —Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter

900544060.baseEffect_:
Until the start of your next turn, your leader can't take more than 5 damage at a time.
Enhance (9): Randomly put 4 different Machina followers (excluding Aenea, Amethyst Rebel) from your deck into play.
900544060.baseFlair_: If you put enough junk together, sometimes it gains new purpose. And if you put it together with a friend, then you might just find new happiness.

105513010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
105513010.baseFlair_: They say home is where the soul is.

101522010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
101522010.baseFlair_: Death gathers, and it knows no bounds.

101532010.baseEffect_: Whenever you perform Necromancy, summon a Ghost.
101532010.baseFlair_: Hey, ghosts and ghostesses! Come on and dance with me!

100511010.baseFlair_: A drop of dragon's blood falls on a woeful carcass. The evil god's power has resurrected the dead soldier as a soldier of death. In its skeletal chest is but one wish: to offer blood and death to the master.
100511010.evoFlair_: The sergeant's dragon-like fangs tear through anyone who defies its evil god. Prideful warriors are but playthings for this creature, which seeks to kill until it perishes once again.

100511020.baseFlair_: I'm so lonely, and it's so cold here. Can you stay with me? Please?
100511020.evoFlair_: Don't be scared of me. I just want to be with someone, that's all. Please, will you go with me into the beyond?

101511010.baseFlair_: The bones of the dead are a treasure trove for those who seek the spoils of war. But you would do well to remember that every treasure has a guardian.
101511010.evoFlair_: Some people refuse to die. Their malice is such that they refuse to be taken even once they're reduced to dry bones. Thieves come in search of the treasures of the dead but find themselves condemned to the same fate.

101511020.baseFlair_: Things that die turn to dust? Ha! Only children believe that nonsense! Love, you see, never dies.
101511020.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it is lost, love abides. Don't you think that's just wonderful? Now come show me that you love me!

101511060.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
101511060.baseFlair_: Advance, brethren, and do not fear death! Your lives shall fuel our assaults on our enemies!
101511060.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
101511060.evoFlair_: Your malice shall remain as you sink into the underworld. I shall weave your grudges into a curse and wield it in the name of revenge!

101511110.baseFlair_: A corpse animated by an ancient curse. Do not allow the lifelessness to lure you into a false sense of security. Get tangled in the bandages and you'll be devoured.
101511110.evoFlair_: Once the bandages have you in their grasp, your passage to the world of the dead is assured. But is that such a bad thing? It's nice and warm inside the wrappings, you know. Maybe you should try them on for size.

102511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Ghost if an evolved allied follower is in play.
102511010.baseFlair_: So, you want to go beyond taboos? I'd love to help you out with that.
102511010.evoFlair_: So, you want to go beyond taboos? Then you need to kill! To drown the night in blood!

103511030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect - When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play give it the following effect: When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
103511030.baseFlair_: I believe in fighting fire with fire. If the grave robbers insist on digging up corpses to create monsters, I'll defend this graveyard by siccing my monstrous hunting hounds on them.
103511030.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play give it the following effect: When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
103511030.evoFlair_: May grave robbers sleep in graves. May those who unearth the dead join them... Once they're gone, my hounds and I will guard them for eternity.

105511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and draw 2 cards.
105511010.baseFlair_: The demon-eating demon you heard about was me. I guess we're all related, but a meal's still a meal!
105511010.evoFlair_: Looks like quite the feast today! I'll be having a main dish of vengeance, hors d'oeuvres of hatred, and death pangs for dessert!

105511030.baseFlair_: Bones, bones, stack and form. Abandon your shape of old and into a new shape be reborn. —A heartless necromancer
105511030.evoFlair_: Bones, bones, forget when you were a man! You're an ogre now, so serve mightily under my command! —A heartless necromancer

106511030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
106511030.baseFlair_: A fire god known as the Shining One. Even should he perish, the flames which rise from his globe will still burn on. —Death and Fire, Chapter 1
106511030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
106511030.evoFlair_: He manifests fire and garbs himself in embers. This is evidence of his eternal, unfailing power. It is said that should his body rot away, his shimmer would still linger. —Death and Fire, Chapter 4

107511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card.
107511010.baseFlair_: The more... death... you see, t-the better you become at necromancy. So, p-please... show me.
107511010.evoFlair_: Thank you for showing me... it feels so... familiar. The soul... I-I can hear it... It's c-calling to me... I can hear it!

107511030.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 1 defense to your leader.
107511030.baseFlair_: These insects wear rigid animal bones for protection, and instinctively gather large bones to increase their chances of survival. —Creatures of Death, Chapter 1
107511030.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 1 defense to your leader.
107511030.evoFlair_: In recent years, they can commonly be found on the battlefield—unsurprising, as there are plenty of bones to be found on dead mercenaries. —Creatures of Death, Chapter 2

108511010.baseFlair_: You're just a pile of bones now, and you're still shy? Go ahead, say hello!
108511010.evoFlair_: Even dead, you're still like you've always been. I like how shy you are. I've always liked that since way, way back!

109511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
109511020.baseFlair_: I don't look so good? Well, I haven't been able to sleep in ages. You see, there's a legendary spell in Estalucia... And I've been killing myself searching for a route there...
109511020.evoFlair_: Before I exhaust my life force, I'll give Honey a body of her own, so she can walk this mortal world. I hope I can make it in time...

110511030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3. Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
110511030.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. Speaking is deception. Everything is perfect in the still depths of quiescence.
110511030.evoFlair_:
The First Record: Remain Undivided
Language emerged when countries developed separate borders and histories. Verbalization plays no part in unity.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

111511010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain Last Words: Summon 2 Skeletons.
111511010.baseFlair_:
Cowardly Matador: W-wait! I thought that thing was dead!
Mischievous Necromancer: Someone asked me to bring him back!
111511010.evoFlair_:
Cowardly Matador: How long is this thing going to chase me?
Mischievous Necromancer: Until death! Oh. But it's already dead...

112511010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and summon 3 Ghosts.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost.
112511010.baseFlair_: My editor's got some nerve! All he did was make ridiculous complaints about my manuscript! First of all, I'm a ghost! I'm already dead! How can he expect me to "breathe life" into my writing?
112511010.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost.
112511010.evoFlair_: What? He liked my manuscript this time? I did a good job expressing the sorrow of death and the joy of life? But... But of course! Haha! I used some of my own experiences from when I was alive as inspiration!

112511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower, then draw 2 cards. If it's a Machina follower, gain +1/+1.
112511020.baseFlair_: Just picked up a fresh cadaver! Wonder what this thing eats? Raw meat? Souls? Or maybe something else? Oh well! I'll just feed it whatever for now! —Novice Necromancer
112511020.evoFlair_: A cadaver's physical form is composed of whatever it consumes after death. As such, the skill of its creator is reflected in its quality. I must say, this one is most impressive... I've never seen anything like it. —Veteran Necromancer

113511030.baseFlair_: The eternity of death nourishes him to lead a legion of corpses. He is their commander—a silent king from a time forgotten. He spreads an ancient curse as silent as death itself. Rumors say that if he were to speak, his dignity would be lost to the sands of time.
113511030.evoEffect_: Evolve: If another allied follower is in play, perform Necromancy (8) - Give Storm to another allied follower.
113511030.evoFlair_: A forbidden sarcophagus covers his face, and cloth swaddles his mysteries. He is the sole overseer. Yet he himself can never be seen, for a fear of the unknown secures his power. Rumors say that if he were to show his face, the facade would immediately crumble to dust.

114511030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: Gain 1 shadow.
114511030.baseFlair_: The clop of fleshless hooves resounds. The revenant ram prances forth. "To repay the debt it owes humans and sheepdogs for their protection in life, the revenant will devour any dangerous spirits which approach them. The cycle of life and death is a fascinating thing."
114511030.evoFlair_: The living do not gather here. The revenant herd grazes only upon spirits. "The rams gather spirits about them like a living sheep's fleece. But they soon devour this warm coat, leaving their bones bare once more. The cycle of life and death never fails to entertain."

115511020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Skeleton into your hand. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Skeleton instead.
115511020.baseFlair_:
The skeletal crane's cry is that of a soul rent in two.
"The deeper the love, the deeper the loss. That mother crane was resurrected without her child. What does she see with those empty eyes? I wonder if she regrets coming back."
115511020.evoFlair_:
Her featherless wings cannot fly. Instead, she walks.
"Resurrected animals can no longer bring forth new life. Nonetheless, they live on. What else can they do but move forward? Surely their rebirth had a purpose, after all."

900511030.baseFlair_: Ain't no one gonna be the boss of me. I'm gonna live the way I like. God knows when I'm dead some necromancer will be working me to the bone. —A Young Man at the Tavern
900511030.evoFlair_: All you do is drink from morning till night, grumbling into your cups. You're like a living corpse. Why don't you try walking with your arms held straight out in front of you? Bet the look would suit you! —Barman at the Tavern

101521020.baseFlair_: Your death will make me stronger. But do not concern yourself with me; I can survive perfectly well all alone.
101521020.evoFlair_: I cannot do it all again—the sadness, the pain. Once I'm laid to rest beneath the ground, my love, let's meet in our dreams.

103521030.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
103521030.baseFlair_: The sound of large stones being dragged along reverberates through the corridors of the hospital ward. This is proof that the women in charge of the ward are on patrol.
103521030.evoEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
103521030.evoFlair_: The sound of footsteps echoes through the hospital corridors. A new patient has strayed into this nightmare. The women, as devoted to their work as ever, run to offer their protection.

105521010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Randomly put a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match into your hand.
105521010.baseFlair_: Charon has her hands full when there are too many souls down here. So I send back the ones who deserve to live.
105521010.evoFlair_: Hades fills up with souls when you're so eager to die. Now head back home. Charon doesn't need to know.

109521020.baseFlair_: My lover was a wonderful person, and my child, the cutest. There's no way I'll let them go... After all, we're a family.
109521020.evoFlair_: Our love will last forever. An endless affection, unwavering. Well, shall we show you how tightly our family bonds are tied?

111521010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Choose: Summon a Spellplate Cavalier or Bone Cavalier.
111521010.baseFlair_: A ghastly knight storms the battlefield with his army of accursed souls. His regrets from previous campaigns torment him still, allowing him no rest.
111521010.evoFlair_: The deathless knight and his infernal army ride into battle tonight as every night, bony fingers grasping for the victories their living hands could not claim.

112521010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Deep Dream into your hand.
112521010.baseFlair_: Oh, welcome. It's been so long since I had a guest. This is your dream, as well as my own. Only those who have come to despise living are able to enter this place. What do you say we enjoy ourselves a little? You'll have so much fun you'll never want to wake up again.
112521010.evoFlair_: You're the one who came here, but now you say you want to wake up? Of course, I don't mind. Although... I'm afraid it's a little too late for that. You see, I'm going to gobble this dream right up.

113521020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Randomly put a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied Machina followers that has been destroyed this match into your hand.
113521020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. New methods of automation were born. The Robozombie—a way to employ the dead through machinery. So efficient that some are considering using it on the living.  —A Necromancer's Secret Notes II
113521020.evoFlair_:
A corpse that moves at will through machinery... Simply brilliant. In fact, you could say it's similar to my own technique of creating corpses from the living! Did you know? The people call me the hand of God.
—Irongear Corpsman to Robozombie

115521010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Enhance (8): Gain +4/+4 and destroy that follower instead.
115521010.baseFlair_:
She brought a snowstorm upon the disordered masses, so fierce they could see naught but white before them, and the howling winds swallowed their screams.
—Demonic Procession, Lady Vanguard
115521010.evoFlair_:
Ohh, that there's a yuki-onna. The wintry mountain incarnate, she is. Nothin' a mortal can do to stop her. Chills the blood, it does.
—Demonic Procession, Yuki-Onna in Oral Tradition

116521020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain 2 shadows.
Enhance (6): Destroy an enemy follower.
116521020.baseFlair_:
Take heed—every human is guilty of three sins. Eventually, when the world is no more than a den of criminals, and dark with the shadow of vice, the Reaper will appear. And he will come swinging the Triscythe.
—Aberrant Reaper, Chapter 3
116521020.evoFlair_:
Keep fear in your heart, ye thrice-stained sinner. When the three evils come together in one body, when you and the sins are one and the same, the Reaper will appear. And he will come bearing three deaths.
—Aberrant Reaper, Chapter 3

117521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any allied amulets in play, summon a Ghost. Then, if there are at least 2 in play, evolve it.
117521020.baseFlair_: Did you really think death could keep me from my duties? Perish the thought. The young master needs every attendant, even ghostly ones. Now, if you'll excuse me. With so much to do around here, I must return to work right away.
117521020.evoFlair_:
It didn't matter how high my status was. I always looked up to her. She helped me grow from an awkward kid into a successful adult. Sigh... I love this house... My beloved ghost house...
—Elderly Margrave on the Decline

103531030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
103531030.baseFlair_: Resentment and hatred coalesce into a dreadful manifestation. It flickers as it walks ghost-like and silent, and it takes the heads of the living.
103531030.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
103531030.evoFlair_: Resentment and hatred coalesce into a dreadful manifestation. It lacks a distinct shape, which makes it impossible for all but the most prepared to pursue.

104531020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Destroy an evolved enemy follower.
104531020.baseFlair_: Fresh souls are the best souls—that's why I keep saying bye-bye and hello. Whenever I'm sick of a soul, I toss it and get another!
104531020.evoFlair_: Did you say bye-bye to life? Then let me say hello! It's good to meet you!

106531020.baseFlair_: It is a demon well-versed in geometry, cartometry, and astronomy. From its demonic beak out spills the wisdom of the ages. —Encyclopedia Demonica, Chapter 65, Section 1
106531020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give all of the followers in your hand Last Words: Draw a card.
Last Words: Draw a card.
106531020.evoFlair_: A demon whose bird calls could be mistaken for lectures on every type of science. When it beats its demonic wings, even the scholastically hopeless gain a semblance of understanding. —Encyclopedia Demonica, Chapter 65, Section 2

108531030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give a random allied follower Last Words - Summon a Skeleton.
108531030.baseFlair_: The master necromancer dropped the battlefield deep below the earth. No longer would they count the deaths; instead they would count the days of eternity.
108531030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give a random allied follower Last Words - Summon a Zombie.
108531030.evoFlair_: Plying his trade on the battlefield, the necromancer deceived the living and made the dead quake. There was no distinction between friend and foe; the only thing that existed was a tremendous mass of death.

109531020.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
109531020.baseFlair_:
"Who..."
"Danua wants to know who you are."
"We're not weirdos! Don't get the wrong idea!"
109531020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give all other allied followers Clash - Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
109531020.evoFlair_:
"Pat..."
"Hey! You better hand over the pats now, bub!"
"Captain, please reward her with the usual, ceremonial patting."

111531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 4 attack, put a Forbidden Art into your hand, and change this follower's attack to 1.
Last Words: Put a Nicola, Forbidden Strength into your hand and give it +X/+0. X equals the attack of this follower before being destroyed.
111531010.baseFlair_: I wouldn't do that if I were you. I'm a monster. I think I'd break you. If that's what you want... then fine, I guess. But I'll tell you now, nothing good's gonna come of it.
111531010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Nicola, Forbidden Strength into your hand and give it +X/+0. X equals the attack of this follower before being destroyed.
111531010.evoFlair_: Yaaawn... Oh, hey. Was I asleep? 'Guess it's about time I made an effort, huh? I'll try not to hurt you too bad... when I obliterate you.

113531020.baseFlair_: Slash them with a blade? Burn them with sorcery? Weak! Cut your enemies down with your own fists! Burn them through real hand-to-hand combat! Your very own body is capable enough, and that's where the real thrill of battle lies!
113531020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals this follower's attack.
113531020.evoFlair_: There's a limit to how much damage a mere weapon can do! But there is one weapon, if prepared properly, capable of blowing your enemies away in a single blow—the body!

115531030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and Ward. Destroy an enemy follower.
Last Words: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's attack.
115531030.baseFlair_: It is not a knight, but the regret born of knightly death. The grudges scattered across the battlefield meld into a mockery of those who shed them. This undead knight rides through the darkness, leaving shards of itself behind.
115531030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's attack.
115531030.evoFlair_:
False knight—you amalgam of resentment who usurps the visages of the fallen. Without purpose or conviction, you exist merely to plague the living. I feel nothing but pity for you.
—Demonlord Eachtar

116531010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
If this follower was summoned with an effect, gain +X/+X and Rush. X equals the number of other allied Machina followers in play.
116531010.baseFlair_:
The development of machinery revolutionized necromancy. Mass exhumations became easier with new tools; necromancers began delving for superior souls. Not even the dead could escape the cacophony of progress.
—Note from the Technomancy Research Society
116531010.evoFlair_: Ghosts do not need to rest in peace, nor do they need to wander in silence. Come with your lively clamor, stir sleeping bones, welcome the dead back to this side of the veil. Death is a resource. Those who are still living would do well to exploit it. —Spirit Noise

117531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Reanimate (10).
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, draw a card.
117531020.baseFlair_: Dead bones are great too, but you can do so much more with living ones! Now, the reason I resurrected you was to get a dance party going! Come on, everybody, wave your bones in the air like you just don't care!
117531020.evoEffect_: Whenever you perform Burial Rite, draw a card.
117531020.evoFlair_:
Flesh is passé. Give me bones any day. Just once I'd love to chat with someone who understands bones like I do.
—Prince Catacomb

109541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this is your tenth turn or later, Burial Rite (2) - Give all other allied followers the ability to attack 3 times this turn.
(To perform Burial Rite (2), there must be at least 2 open spaces in your area after this follower comes into play.)
109541010.baseFlair_: I've spent decades on an island enshrouded in fog, so this outside world never ceases to amaze me.
109541010.evoFlair_: I was without a family or a name, but new friends found me and took me out into the world. I'll find some way to repay them while I search for my sister.

114541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied cards with Last Words effects have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied follower or amulet comes into play, give it Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Last Words: Draw a card.
114541020.baseFlair_: I record every life and every death. I stand opposite the judge, and make a record of each soul's value. There is honor in a fitting end. May your praises outlast you.
114541020.evoFlair_: The great scribe records mortals' fates in perfect hieroglyphics. Their footsteps are graven in writing—never to fade, even once the feet which left them have passed beyond. Records are the soul's immortality, imbued with meaning once death's curtain has fallen.

114541030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Necromancy (8) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
114541030.baseFlair_: In life, he was shackled by his natural kindness. Many were the chains which held him back. His final days were spent in fearsome battle and the emptiness of defeat. Never able to reveal his true abilities, he died filled with regret.
114541030.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
114541030.evoFlair_: My motherland and her enemy are dust. None live who know my name. I am all that remains—one lone soldier, nameless and free. Being naught but bones is not so bad when my heart feels so light. Some call me the Dead Legend... That, too, is nothing but excess fat to trim away.

116541010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if you have more shadows than cards in your deck, invoke this card.
When this follower comes into play, if you have more shadows than cards in your deck, give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when you perform Necromancy, gain X shadows and recover X play points. X equals the Necromancy cost. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116541010.baseFlair_: I know what you're thinking: you can't change fate, and you can't escape death. Must suck being a human, seeing as you can't tell the future and all. But don't give up yet. Show me some guts—um, the figurative kind—and I'll take care of the rest!
116541010.evoFlair_: So you get it now? Death is just a big bully sometimes—you can totally escape him. So who cares if you can't see the future? As long as you show some spine, somebody'll help you. I promise. In fact, that somebody might just be me!

900541120.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Last Words: Give +2/+0 to all allied Ginsetsu, Great Foxes.
900541120.baseFlair_: The fox's voice is a call to delusion. What is it you see that we don't? You seem to be enjoying yourself, at any rate.
900541120.evoFlair_: You fox-hunters don't have a clue. Oh, dear. Did you think you were a match for me? Haha, sorry. But I'll admit... you've piqued my interest.

900541130.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to 2 random allied followers.
900541130.baseFlair_: Lemme tell ya what I hate. For one? Men. Every last one of 'em. For two? Anyone who hurts my daughter. And you're both, so you're goin' away!
900541130.evoFlair_: Bet you already know what I like. For one? Beautiful women. For two? My beloved daughter. And all I have to do to show off for both of 'em is tan your sorry hide!

100514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Necromancy (2): Deal 5 damage instead.
100514010.baseFlair_: The flesh has rotted away, and even the bones are dust. All that's left is resentment.

705514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Necromancy (2): Deal 5 damage instead.
705514010.baseFlair_: Excuse me... Could you please refrain from singing those hymns around me?

101514020.baseEffect_: Give Bane to an allied follower.
101514020.baseFlair_: I don't fully understand where humans came from. But I know quite well the ways they can die.

104514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (7): Then summon 3 Zombies.
104514010.baseFlair_: Is death a tragedy, or is it a comedy?

108514010.baseFlair_: I said I'd return you from the abyss to the land of the living. But I didn't say a thing about making you whole again. —A cruel necromancer

111514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Ghost.
111514010.baseFlair_: Millennia of resentment and anger, coalesced into a single body.

708514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Ghost.
708514010.baseFlair_: I was broken to begin with. This is who I truly am.

116514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Ghost into your hand.
116514010.baseFlair_: One mask of death flies at your face. And another. And another. And another.

117514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Draw a card.
117514010.baseFlair_:
I was just thinking about going for a snack!
—Demon Eater

101524020.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
Necromancy (4): Give +2/+0 to that follower.
101524020.baseFlair_: She dilutes the soul to hide the being's presence.

102524030.baseEffect_: Randomly put a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match into your hand.
102524030.baseFlair_: Oops, guess they died. Let the next battle begin!

106524010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower and an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
106524010.baseFlair_: None but the dead can promise their king an eternal troth.

105534010.baseEffect_: Change an allied Neutral follower into a Shadowcraft follower. Give that follower Last Words: Summon a copy of this follower.
105534010.baseFlair_: To the living it tastes of poison; to the dead it tastes of nectar.

117534010.baseEffect_:
Destroy a follower.
Both players perform Reanimate (3).
117534010.baseFlair_: Some begged not to die. Others, not to be born. Either way, Atomy did not care.

900534030.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects from an enemy follower. Change its attack and defense to 0/1.
Give +3/+3 to a random allied Miyako, Pudding Poltergeist.
900534030.baseFlair_: Pudding! Pudding, pudding, pudding, puuuddiiinnnggg! It's snack time, and what's on the menu is you!

106512010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied follower comes into play, gain 1 shadow.
106512010.baseFlair_: The war's started? Time to do some investing. —Young necromancer

109512010.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Profane Resurrection or Fabled Treasure.
----------
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Zombie.
109512010.baseFlair_: Finding what you seek isn't the hard part. How will you reach for it when you arrive? Will you overcome your fears... or succumb to them? —Words of a seasoned adventurer

104522010.baseEffect_: At the end of your opponent's turn, perform Necromancy (4): Summon a Zombie.
104522010.baseFlair_: Dig on to the ends of the underworld.

105522010.baseEffect_: Destroy a random allied Shadowcraft follower at the end of your turn if you have both a Shadowcraft follower and a Neutral follower in play. Then give a random allied Neutral follower +X/+X. X equals the attack of the Shadowcraft follower.
105522010.baseFlair_: Sirens cry to lure in sailors. They cry again once their meal is complete.

117523010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card and add X to this amulet's Countdown. X equals half the original cost of the follower destroyed by Burial Rite (rounded down).
Last Words: Summon a copy of the follower destroyed by Burial Rite.
117523010.baseFlair_: No one remembers why the coffin was sealed, but one thing's for sure: you'd better not open the damned thing.

100511030.baseFlair_: As death accumulates, life is formed. Do you understand?
100511030.evoFlair_: Sadness, grief, pain, and anger... Tell me of all these feelings you harbor within you. Whisper them to me, and I will ensure that you are avenged!

101511030.baseFlair_: Blessed are those who cannot see the creature, for they will be fearless until just before the moment of death.
101511030.evoFlair_: Can you feel it—the cold that makes you shiver? Death already hovers near you. If it continues to steal the warmth from your body, it'll eventually steal your life as well.

101511040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
101511040.baseFlair_: Hey, I'm not going to tell you again! If you're nasty to me, I will tell the bunny spirits—and that's a promise!
101511040.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
101511040.evoFlair_: One bunny's not much by itself, but they're strong in groups. I wouldn't underestimate these spirits if I were you!

101511050.baseFlair_: A battle-obsessed warrior launches himself into the fray, crossing the boundary between the living and the undead.
101511050.evoFlair_: A warrior quivers with sheer delight. He is but bones, but he fights nonetheless! With no memories of his former life, he will spend the rest of his days engaged in brutal, blissful slaughter.

101511090.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
101511090.baseFlair_: The crazed hunger for battle drives the corpses of fallen fanatics back into the fray, and each slash of their swords takes yet another life.
101511090.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
101511090.evoFlair_: No flesh, no heart, no eyes—and yet the ability to kill is not diminished by death. The bloodthirsty warrior simply prowls the night, always seeking the next battle.

102511020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, gain 2 shadows.
102511020.baseFlair_: Those who chase death are in turn haunted by it. And their bodies eventually succumb to decay.
102511020.evoEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, gain 2 shadows.
102511020.evoFlair_: Those who chase death are in turn haunted by it. But not even the prospect of decay could ever deter me.

102511060.baseFlair_: A soldier who guards the royal tombs even after death.
102511060.evoFlair_: The soldier continues to hold his post, stripped of flesh but not pride.

103511040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
103511040.baseFlair_: Patrolling the Dragonarium, that's my responsibility! If I find anyone sneaking about, I'll get rid of them with these knives!
103511040.evoFlair_: Hey, you seem to be sneaking about, but spare me your excuses. I'm really not interested, so let's get straight to the part where I dice you up!

103511050.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Lich.
103511050.baseFlair_: Thinking about attacking me? You should know that there's a special someone watching my back...
103511050.evoEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Lich.
103511050.evoFlair_: My friend is a lord of the darkness! Sound scary? Well, hand over your soul or you'll be seeing him up close!

103511060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (2) - Gain Last Words: Summon a Zombie.
103511060.baseFlair_: Ugh, I'm so sick of the horizon! And the sea breeze stings me where I'm rotting!
103511060.evoFlair_: I really miss the solid ground! Maybe I'll abandon piracy and give the life of a bandit a try!

104511040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +2/+2.
104511040.baseFlair_:
"You reek. Are you rotting or what?"
"Me? I don't smell nothing..."
"That's 'cause your nose fell off!"
—A conversation between a goblin and goblin zombie
104511040.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +2/+2.
104511040.evoFlair_:
"What are you looking at?"
"Dinner!"
"Wait... Stop! Cut it ou—"
—A conversation between two goblin zombies

113511020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
113511020.baseFlair_:
Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. The Bone Drone seeks revenge from beyond the grave, utilizing technology in order to exact vengeance with a new body.
—A Necromancer's Secret Notes I
113511020.evoFlair_:
With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of an "optimal corpse" has changed. Whether it is a corpse returned by an ancient grudge, or bones which seethe with malice, the specimen will be terrifying regardless.
—Comparison of Bone Drone and Mechasaw Deathbringer

114511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +2/+2 and Bane. Then give Bane to another allied follower.
114511020.baseFlair_:
One night, a young man began to attack his fellow villagers out of nowhere. Many were killed before he was brought down. His vengeful spirit left his body and disappeared we know not where.
—Vengeful Spirits in Folklore
114511020.evoFlair_:
Confronted by a possessing spirit, all fall weeping to their knees. All that awaits is death or murder.
—Vengeful Spirits in Folklore

115511010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be attacked.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has 2 defense or less, perform Necromancy (3) - Banish the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
115511010.baseFlair_:
The child passed by, singing and bouncing a small cloth ball. Those who saw her tried to flee, but stumbled and fell.
—Demonic Procession, Childlike Leader
115511010.evoEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has 2 defense or less, perform Necromancy (3) - Banish the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
115511010.evoFlair_:
So long as she remains, you'll have good fortune, but her departure means your doom. She'll take all the luck in the house along with her.
—Demonic Procession, Zashiki-Warashi in Oral Tradition

115511030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, destroy 1, draw a card, and restore 4 defense to your leader.
115511030.baseFlair_:
Welcome to the Hermopolis Hideaway! You must be tired from plundering pyramids all day. Why not relax with some good food? Your timing couldn't be better—I just got a delivery of fresh ingredients...
—Mummy Chef
115511030.evoFlair_:
I thought we were done for when we fell into that trap, but fortune really smiled on us. Now we can get back to exploring! Wait. Where's the new guy? Is he off somewhere goofing around again?
—Lead archaeologist

116511020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Necrofauna.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 instead.
116511020.baseFlair_: Midnight. The ghost of a cat meows and breaks the silence. An old man looks up; the stone wall of his face cracks into a smile. "Say, has Mrs. Mittens finally made a friend? How grand. She's been moody since I resurrected her—guess no one likes to be woken up early."
116511020.evoFlair_:
The sleep enjoyed by spectral animals has, in recent years, been polluted by noise. The creatures are disturbed by unfamiliar sounds and metal shapes. Let the dead rest in peace—cognizance should belong only to the living.
—Tranquil Resurrection, Part 1

117511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card.
117511020.baseFlair_: My dear lady, souls only become shining masterpieces if they satisfy three conditions: you must be greedy in life, you must rue on your deathbed, and you must carry that regret into the afterlife. I guess what I'm trying to say is... that's a shiny soul you've got there.
117511020.evoFlair_: I'm not one to talk, but the world is full of strange folk. Why would anyone trade something as priceless as a soul for a bit of coin? Haha... But that works for me. Just don't come running to me with seller's remorse, all right?

101521030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
101521030.baseFlair_: Can you hear the voices of these little ones? They're bitter—bitter toward life and people who are alive. So I long for suffering—suffering of all the arrogant living.
101521030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
101521030.evoFlair_: Humans caused these little ones to suffer and killed them. As a necromancer I listen to them, and it's my duty to fulfill their wishes. This time it's the humans' turn to suffer.

101521050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Destroy an enemy amulet.
101521050.baseFlair_: Dear me! Look at all this filthy magic swirling around the place! Don't worry though. Thanks to this grimoire, I'll soon have it all in order!
101521050.evoFlair_: Look, this isn't your domain, you know! This is my world! After all, it's my magic that's filling the place! I think I'll remind you which of us is more powerful.

102521040.baseFlair_: The bones of two corpses and the souls of two beasts... Add a little dark magic and you have a brutal chimera.
102521040.evoFlair_: The bones of two corpses and the souls of two beasts... No matter how many times it's cut down or shattered, this bizarre fusion shudders back to life in a new form.

106521010.baseFlair_: Shoot a bow? Launch a spell? Hah! That's for total cretins! I crush bones with my fists and tear through flesh with my kicks! That's what battle's all about!
106521010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
106521010.evoFlair_: Cheating with weapons—that's not my style! Fight one-to-one, beat 'em one-to-one. Showing 'em what I've got—now that's what they call "spirit!"

107521010.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
107521010.baseFlair_: Yuck, ghosts. Creepy, floaty, little things—we should just send them back to the void where they belong!
107521010.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
107521010.evoFlair_: Ugh, ghosts are the worst, aren't they? The way they just show up out of thin air—let's exterminate these pests already!

108521010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Destroy a random enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
108521010.baseFlair_: Wherever I look, there are scrubby little souls. But the scrawny ones are so boring. I only care about hunting big souls.
108521010.evoFlair_: Big souls are where it's at. They fill my mouth and my belly. That's why I only go for huge ones.

109521010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Fran's Attendant or Fran's Curse into your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Put both into your hand instead.
109521010.baseFlair_: Look, it's right here in this picture book. See, the hero defeats the monster, right? We all want to see a happy ending, so won't you kill me?
109521010.evoFlair_: The human body is so feeble and frail. Just one little squeeze and all the insides pop out. If you don't want to end up like that, won't you kill me?

110521020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
Clash: If the enemy follower has Storm or Rush, give it -2/-0.
110521020.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. To speak is to err. Silver tongues glitter, but luster is ephemeral. Find true freedom in quiescence.
110521020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: If the enemy follower has Storm or Rush, give it -2/-0.
110521020.evoFlair_:
The Second Record: Meditate
Silver tongues are iron chains. Quiescence is the natural state of both heaven and earth. Nothing eclipses silence.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

111521020.baseEffect_: Last Words: If it is your turn, summon a Ghost.
111521020.baseFlair_: So? Whaddya think? Pretty sweet noggin, right? My real one was even nicer though—I was quite the looker! Say! You haven't seen it lying around, have you?
111521020.evoFlair_: Hahaaa! So that's where I left my head! This head right here's my calling card! The mark of the lord of the shady part of town! C'mon, you pack of reprobates! What we need here's a little comedy!

115521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower with an original attack of 1 and a random follower with an original defense of 1 (excluding Kasha) from your deck into your hand.
115521020.baseFlair_:
Next, the icebound town was visited by a rain of fire from a flying chariot. Mouths, clenched in lament of the cold, next opened to wail as they burned.
—Demonic Procession, Central Flame
115521020.evoFlair_:
Mortals have a right to mourn their dead, but this demon robs them even of that. And just where does it take those unfortunate souls?
—Demonic Procession, Kasha in Oral Tradition

116521010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand and change its cost to 0.
116521010.baseFlair_: A medium invites a specter into her body. The two souls regard each other. "You know that phrase, 'together as one'? I think this is what it means. It means surpassing till-death-do-us-part, so you never have to say goodbye again."
116521010.evoFlair_:
Spectral animals achieve tranquility when they are left to govern themselves. Mediums from foreign lands fail to understand this. They come in with their clanging metal, disturbing the graves and the repose of the dead.
—Tranquil Resurrection, Part 2

101531020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Give Bane to all allied followers.
101531020.baseFlair_: Why do people weep when confronted with death? I do not understand it. Death happens every day. It comes to us all regardless of whether or not we are alive.
101531020.evoFlair_: Why fear death? It is your constant companion, always nestled up next to you. It is your destiny. Part of the divine plan. Come, accept your fate.

108531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Put a random Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, restore 1 defense to your leader.
108531020.baseFlair_: Running won't do one bit of good. Death has eyes that pierce the night. Death flies noiselessly through the darkness—and one day it will land by your side.
108531020.evoEffect_: Whenever you perform Burial Rite, restore 1 defense to your leader.
108531020.evoFlair_: Running won't do one bit of good. Death is always there. The night you sleep in is death itself.

109531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Last Words - Summon a Fiendish Wraithknight.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
109531010.baseFlair_: Did madness take him before death? Or did death bring forth madness? Those memories must have died long ago, for all that stands before you is despair, madness, and death.
109531010.evoFlair_: Along with his will to speak, his past died long ago. All souls will eventually end up here as well, wavering in the valley between madness and death.

113531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
113531010.baseFlair_: As the successor, I must fulfill my duty and prove myself—I'll steel my heart, my body, all of myself. Whatever it takes, I'll attain such bravery worthy of ruling the Underworld!
113531010.evoFlair_:
"Hehe... He's grown into such a fine warrior."
—Tithi, Nurturing Trainer

"Impressive. We'll increase the difficulty for him."
—Aisha, Stern Trainer

114531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Evolve this follower.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn summon a Zombie, then remove this effect.
114531010.baseFlair_: Stay where you are. If you value your life, come no further. This place belongs to the dead. It is thick with phantasmal miasma. This is no place for the living. Go back to the world of light.
114531010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn summon a Lich, then remove this effect.
114531010.evoFlair_: Forgive me... It seems I've expressed myself poorly yet again. You see, my magic is what powers this building. So believe me when I say it's dangerous for the living to come inside.

114531030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Reanimate (3).
Evolve this follower if it was summoned using Reanimate.
114531030.baseFlair_:
Behold, the ultimate technique of the Corrupted Soil Style—Edict of the Armored Corpse! Even without a soul, this shell will stand against the incursion of evil! By my master's orders, you will be punished for your sins!
—Fighting Jiangshi
114531030.evoFlair_:
Ahahaha! They really made a mess of you, my jiangshi! You've been very useful. I suppose I could let you have that funeral now... But I think I might miss those dramatic monologues of yours.
—Necromancer

116531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Fabled Treasure.
Enhance (6): Summon a Profane Resurrection. Evolve this follower.
116531020.baseFlair_: A beastly revenant sits before the tomb of a king, bidding farewell to the day. "Spectral animals are one with nature. So long as the sun rises and sets, I'll be here waiting. Hey, pal. It'd be nice if our masters reawakened soon, eh?"
116531020.evoFlair_:
Are the dead meant to be left in peace? Or are they meant to be roused with a deafening din? Only spirits born from nature know. But remember that death is an acquittal. Souls that find their way back deserve a new beginning.
—Tranquil Resurrection, Part 3

104541010.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, gain 20 shadows. When this follower leaves play, lose 20 shadows. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Whenever you perform Necromancy, gain X shadows. X equals the Necromancy cost.
104541010.baseFlair_: After life comes the void... the eternal void... the cradle of souls. I stand watch... and the souls... come to me.
104541010.evoFlair_: Silence is the only rule I know. I simply collect souls... but I don't understand what life or souls really mean... I wonder if I ever will...

110541020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Until the start of your next turn, add 3 to the original cost of spells in your opponent's hand. (Only affects cards in hand at the time this effect is activated.)
110541020.baseFlair_: Shhh. Language breeds both good and evil; only silence creates equality. Close your lips and live in perfection. Behead those who hunger for glory. And, in doing so, we shall put the world to trial.
110541020.evoFlair_: Storyteller or truthsayer, every speaker must be silenced. Quiescence is tranquility, and the reticent shall be compensated justly. And, in doing so, we shall put the world to trial.

900541110.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
-Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
-Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
900541110.baseFlair_: The necromancer frolics with the three dark beasts who love her. "I get along especially well with these three. People were scared of them, saying they're bad luck, but these critters are all really nice. Can you believe they weren't holding a single grudge when they were reborn?"
900541110.evoFlair_: A necromancer and her animal spirits—far more than master and servants. "These critters are the first friends I ever made. They were killed by people who feared them, but they still came to comfort me when I was crying. Thank you for being reborn, so I wouldn't be alone."

101514030.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Gain 1 shadow.
101514030.baseFlair_: The underworld is starting to get a little crowded.

101514040.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied follower and summon a Lich.
101514040.baseFlair_: Die. Then rise and follow me.

102514050.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less. If you have at least 4 shadows, you can perform Necromancy (4) to destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or more instead.

103514020.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Ghosts.
Enhance (8): Give the summoned Ghosts Bane.
103514020.baseFlair_: Two beckoning hands and a single destination.

112514010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Draw a card.
112514010.baseFlair_: I don't need the vessel. Just give me the goods inside it.

108524010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Ghosts.
Enhance (4): Give all allied followers the following effect - When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
108524010.baseFlair_: There are times when you'd almost be happy to see a ghost.

101534020.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to each enemy follower.
Necromancy (6): Deal 3 damage instead.
101534020.baseFlair_: See you on the other side.

103534010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less.
Enhance (7): Then summon a Pluto and give it +X/+Y. X equals the attack and Y equals the defense of that follower.
103534010.baseFlair_: If you can but satisfy me, I'll make your every wish come true.

112522010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, gain 10 shadows, then banish this amulet.
112522010.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated souls. Those who seek rebirth find themselves drawn to its luster.

709522010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, gain 10 shadows, then banish this amulet.
709522010.baseFlair_: "Will you give me all your love?"

900523010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon a Ghost.
At the start of your turn, summon a Ghost.
900523010.baseFlair_: A young girl appears in the dreams of those who have abandoned their attachment to life. She links her own dream with theirs, consuming both in the final moment.

102533010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Whenever you perform Necromancy, add 1 to this amulet's Countdown.
102533010.baseFlair_: A life is never truly wasted. It can be recycled over and over.

102533020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Gain 13 shadows.
Last Words: Change your number of shadows to 0.
102533020.baseFlair_: Will you live long enough to see the morning?

100511040.baseFlair_: Death brings only more death. And so it takes a hold on the world, spreading like a disease.
100511040.evoFlair_: Hear well the rattling, for it is a call to arms. Once the dead have gathered in numbers, they cannot be stopped by the holy.

101511130.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
101511130.baseFlair_: People who waste their days, people who constantly feel unwelcome—even pitiable people like these give me strength when they die. All souls are equal, so you can go in peace.
101511130.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
101511130.evoFlair_: There are plenty of people who are happy to die. I'm basically doing them a favor. Now how about you? Ever feel there isn't a place for you in this world? 'Cause I've always got a place for you.

102511030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give +2/+0 to a random allied follower.
102511030.baseFlair_: An incarnation of hatred and madness that awakens malice and bloodlust.
102511030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give +2/+0 to a random allied follower.
102511030.evoFlair_: An epitome of loathing and insanity that is devoid of will. To be possessed by it is to be ruled by malice and bloodlust.

106511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If only 1 other allied follower is in play, gain Last Words: Summon a Castor.
106511020.baseFlair_: First I shall sing your praises, Pollux. Brilliant martial artist, you control the flow of battle. Even if ten thousand arrows were to strike you, you would walk away without a scratch.
106511020.evoFlair_: Even though we're separated by that infernal place, we're still brothers and compatriots. My song for you ascends from the depths of the land and reaches the heavens, becoming a star whose light will never fade.

107511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
107511020.baseFlair_: Although they seem slow, they're unexpectedly agile when they find their victims, so don't even think about letting your guard down. —Old Grave Robber
107511020.evoFlair_: They diligently continue their fated duty, hoping to see the end someday and finally earn their rest. —Old Grave Robber

110511020.baseFlair_: Hey, come closer. I've got a riddle for ya—been saving it for a trespasser. If a handsome, young coffin devours three smelly humans, how many souls are trapped within it for eternity?
110511020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 3 Ghosts.
Last Words: Reanimate (2)
110511020.evoFlair_: Three? Sorry, man, it's four. You forgot to count me too! Well, guess that means I'm free to go now. Good luck giving out the next riddle!

111511020.baseFlair_: Quiet yourself, before I stitch those lips together myself—before I devour that life of yours. Quiescence demands your silence.
111511020.evoFlair_: Silence is born beneath the shadows of record. Fragile is silence, shattered by the sound of even a single heartbeat. If true silence cannot arise alone, we shall create it with our own hands.

112511030.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon an Assembly Droid.
112511030.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a discarded pile of bones. Fueled by forgotten regrets, it changed form and rose above the earth to take revenge upon the living. —Necromancer's Report, Part 1
112511030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Assembly Droid.
112511030.evoFlair_: I cannot quell my excitement. Today is a momentous day. Previously we had thought that cadavers would only move with the help of our spells. If we conduct more research on the core, we'll be able to better handle them still! —Necromancer's Account, Part 1

114511010.baseFlair_:
Oh, that old lady? 'Course I know who you mean. She guards the Demonlord's gate, eliminating undesirables. She hasn't changed a bit since I was a boy.
—Village elder's account
114511010.evoFlair_:
The secret to longevity? What else!? Staying active keeps your soul young, no matter how wrinkly your hide! But the most important thing is spending quality time with young people... Nyee hee hee!
—Wisdom from an old woman

116511010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Ghost. Then give +1/+0 to all allied Ghosts.
Enhance (8): Summon 3 instead.
116511010.baseFlair_: It's not every day you come back to life. So I thought this was my chance to breathe life into my career. But every time I dance, the living skedaddle and the dead salsa over—this is a show, not a seance. Still, I'm not giving up. I may be dead, but my dreams aren't!
116511010.evoFlair_:
Spectacular performance! Absolutely breathtaking. Say, why don't you join our act? What's that? You feel a bit apprehensive... because you're a ghost? Ha! Nonsense! That's nothing to worry your spectral head over.
—Arcus, Ghostly Manager

117511010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
Last Words: Gain 4 shadows.
----------
Fanfare: Gain 4 shadows.
Last Words: Draw a card.
117511010.baseFlair_: The Three of Cups migrate in solidarity. They stay on each other's wings, swooping, swarming, and pecking at their prey. Macabre caws of thanksgiving are given before the feast of flesh.
117511010.evoFlair_: Beware the predators who peck at the soul. Their outstretched wings blot the sun; their foul beaks gnaw at your insides. What you hear are warbles of joy, for their conceit is sated and their bellies full.

900511040.baseFlair_: Roused by the clamoring voices of those who wish to be restored, evil and hatred rise up from beneath the ground.
900511040.evoFlair_: Abandoned bodies are assembled, bone and sinew fused together once more—a new body formed from corpses and pure hatred, a twisted existence neither living nor dead.

100521010.baseFlair_: My grandma taught me a little necromancy! I wonder if I can pull it off? Well, here goes!
100521010.evoFlair_: Yes! I did it! I summoned two ghosts! Two new friends for me! Hee-hee!

100521020.baseFlair_: King of Demons, can you hear me? You have been sealed away too long. It is time for you to rise. I offer myself to you. Feast upon me and awaken.
100521020.evoFlair_: I have offered you millions of souls. Indeed, there are none remaining in this land... only my own. Here it is. My final offering. Savor it, dear master!

101521040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
101521040.baseFlair_: Eternal life and so much power—I got a lot in return for what I lost. I think I owe the living an arrow or two by way of thanks.
101521040.evoFlair_: I shall live for all eternity. Strike me in the heart if you wish, but nothing can prevent me from charging to the battlefield in search of my enemy.

103521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and a random enemy follower.
103521020.baseFlair_: The living are such a bother. I tell them to quiet down, but they just keep breathing and their hearts keep beating.
103521020.evoFlair_: It's so much easier to relax when it's quiet! Now that we have a bunch more dead servants, why don't we head out and make the world even quieter?

104521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Then give +2/+0 to another random allied follower.
104521020.baseFlair_: I'm Orthrus, the little sister of Cerberus, and I intend to prove my worth by wielding the second most powerful flames in the underworld.
104521020.evoFlair_: You have no idea who you just picked a fight with, do you? There's no need to bother Cerberus with the likes of you. I'm perfectly capable of sending you to the underworld myself!

104521030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers Last Words - Summon a Skeleton.
104521030.baseFlair_: Just as all are mortal, all are immortal. Now be free, dear bones of white!
104521030.evoFlair_: A single touch of my hand brings immortality to the decaying children of flesh. Now dance, my lovely bones.

105521020.baseFlair_: Our blades are sublime, undefiled. They deserve to be held with pride. One must not, however, become attached to that pride. —Meditations of an Executioner
105521020.evoFlair_: One who is attached to death will become entranced with death. If the sublime is defiled, you will become a living nightmare. —Meditations of an Executioner

105521030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all other allied Neutral followers +1/+1. Deal 2 damage to all other allied Shadowcraft followers.
105521030.baseFlair_: Scratch the surface and you'll find another world. Which is true, and which is the lie? I ask you, young lady—which world do you prefer?
105521030.evoFlair_: If you prefer that world, you'll grow closer to this one. It's because destinations are never reached that life is interesting.

108521020.baseEffect_: If you have at least 8 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Giant Skull or Hell Lord Skeleton.
108521020.baseFlair_: Even after turning to bones, it clings to the sword, a remnant from its days of knightly service. Its twisted, swollen arm serves as a mark of the monstrosity it has become.
108521020.evoFlair_: It hungered for strength. For strength, it barked, it would pay any price. The necromancer scoffed, responding that he would provide it with limitless strength.

109521030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Destroy a random enemy follower.
109521030.baseFlair_: I am merely another demon who serves under Charon. Her brightness and fervor are notoriously unrivaled, but I'm surprised to see that she's become quite gentle lately.
109521030.evoFlair_: I am merely another demon who serves under Charon. I'm thankful for my boss's newfound soft demeanor, yet somewhere in my heart I still long for her punishment.

110521010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
110521010.baseFlair_: I smell challengers! Leave this to me, Cerberus! I'll raze them to the ground with the second most powerful flames in the underworld!
110521010.evoFlair_:
Cerberus: I wish she'd settle down a bit.
Charon: She's very dependable, though.

101531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Gain +1/+1, Ward and Bane.
101531010.baseFlair_: The ruler of the Land of the Dead, a king with countless underlings. He has raised an army of undead warriors to protect the dead from the arrogant meddlings of the living—all in the name of having respect for death.
101531010.evoFlair_: Some believe life is sacred. Others prefer death. The wight king seeks to squash the arrogant living to defend those who would live while dead. His ambition is to fill the world with the dead, and he will not stop until he is done.

101531030.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain Ambush.
101531030.baseFlair_: This ghostly dragon dwells in a canyon. Long ago in life, it reigned over the region. And now in death continues to protect its domain.
101531030.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain Ambush.
101531030.evoFlair_: To drive away the survivors among those who dared to enter its canyon, the dragon covered its kingdom in a dark cloud. Ever since, the land has been a cursed realm of constant lightning strikes.

106531010.baseEffect_:
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
106531010.baseFlair_: The sweet nothings you whisper are a red rose—passionate and direct. But I am a blue rose, and we are simply much too different. If you're still after me anyway, then I beg you to please love all of me.
106531010.evoEffect_:
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
106531010.evoFlair_: Blue is the color of the cold night, and red is the color of warm flesh. Haha—surely you'll allow me a nibble. After all, the night has only begun. You will love all of me, won't you?

110531020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with Ward.
110531020.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. When the world finally holds its tongue, stillness will prevail. And in that stillness, we will have everlasting equality.
110531020.evoFlair_:
The Third Record: Seek Stillness
Silence begets stillness, and stillness begets everlasting equality. Seek the stillness by living in quiescence.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

112531020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
112531020.baseFlair_: A watchdog belonging to, well, the watchdog of the underworld. The alpha makes frequent trips to the surface, so she needed a beta to stand guard on her behalf.
112531020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Necromancy (6) - Gain the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
112531020.evoFlair_:
"Woof! It's keeping watch."
"Woof! It's looking at us."
"Well, not like it'd be able to stop me!"
—Cerberus, Hound of Hades

115531020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Necromancy (8) - Recover 1 evolution point.
115531020.baseFlair_:
As the people writhed, wreathed in flame, a demon slipped among them and cut them down one after another. His cruelty shook the very foundations of hell.
—Demonic Procession, Rearguard Demon
115531020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower with an original attack or defense of 1, give it Storm. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
115531020.evoFlair_:
He washes his blade in sake, not to honor the dead but in preparation to add to their ranks. You'd have to be a monster yourself to summon a thing like that.
—Demonic Procession, Shuten-Doji in Oral Tradition

900531010.baseFlair_: My charming knight. You'd be perfect if you just stopped talking. —Fickle Resurrector
900531010.evoFlair_: My charming knight. You're mine now. —Fickle Resurrector

900531020.baseFlair_: My charming knight. You'd be perfect if you just weren't human. —Fickle Resurrector
900531020.evoFlair_: My charming knight. You're mine forever. —Fickle Resurrector

105541020.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
At the start of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Evolve this follower.
105541020.baseFlair_: An undead king sealed within an altar. When the flames of life burn within him again, he will bring woe to all the world.
105541020.evoEffect_:
(Can attack.)
Last Words: Summon an unevolved Corpselord of Woe.
105541020.evoFlair_: An undead king who has risen from the earth in which he was sealed. Flames of resentment grant him insuperable power. The hour of retribution is nigh.

106541010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time an allied follower's Last Words effects activate, repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
106541010.baseFlair_: Dusk. It is the day's end and the night's beginning. Welcome to my borderland, where life and death mingle. Now you are living, and now you are dying.
106541010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time an allied follower's Last Words effects activate, repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
106541010.evoFlair_: Both life and death are transient. Who decided that this rule should be unbendable? In my world, all is indistinct—you shall die, and you shall live.

110541030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give another allied follower Last Words - Draw a card.
Strike: Gain 2 shadows.
110541030.baseFlair_: Destruction and regeneration. Enlightenment and earthly desire. His scales weigh all of creation, and with his crook, he renders judgment. He rules over Aaru, the heavenly fields which only worthy souls can attain. Though he was rent to pieces, death could not keep him.
110541030.evoEffect_:
Strike: Gain 2 shadows.
Last Words: If an allied follower that originally costs 3 play points or less has been destroyed this match, perform Necromancy (5) - Reanimate (3) and Reanimate (1).
110541030.evoFlair_: Glory and downfall. Justice and atrocity. Sins which cannot be exorcised by his crook and flail will fall before his sword. He was the first mummy and remains the final judge, handing down verdicts absolute. Sooner or later, all will stand before him.

111541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Randomly summon 1 of the following.
-Velocious Beetle
-Virulent Hornet
-Vicious Scorpion
-Vengeful Mantis
-Veiled Shudderfly
Enhance (10): Summon 2 more.
111541010.baseFlair_: The lady of a proud house, her domain reduced to a mountain of corpses. Devouring those who mocked her downfall, she was reborn. Now her name is spoken only in reverence. Drawn by her captivating perfume, beetles swarm over her flawless skin.
111541010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Randomly summon 1 of the following.
-Velocious Beetle
-Virulent Hornet
-Vicious Scorpion
-Vengeful Mantis
-Veiled Shudderfly
111541010.evoFlair_: Her lips part to utter curses and beetles swarm forth. Lovely as her outer shell may be, infection teems within. Can you hear the thousand skittering legs? The voices of Hell clamoring beneath her skin? A multitude of tiny wings come bearing the world's undoing.

112541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are no allied Roly-Poly Mk Is in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
At the end of your turn, activate the above effect.
112541020.baseFlair_: Rebelling against the world... That's scary. What can I do? I'm just junk. But, but... I guess I'm not alone.
112541020.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Roly-Poly Mk Is in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
112541020.evoFlair_: I'll fight. For the future. If my sisters are with me, I can do it. I might only be useless junk, but I'll fight with all my heart!

711541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are no allied Roly-Poly Mk Is in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
