At the end of your turn, activate the above effect.
711541010.baseFlair_: Rebelling against the world... That's scary. What can I do? I'm just junk. But, but... I guess I'm not alone.
711541010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Roly-Poly Mk Is in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
711541010.evoFlair_: I'll fight. For the future. If my sisters are with me, I can do it. I might only be useless junk, but I'll fight with all my heart!

113541020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 16 shadows, invoke this card, then lose 8 shadows.
When another allied follower attacks and deals damage to the enemy leader, if this follower hasn't attacked this turn, perform Necromancy (8): Evolve this follower.
113541020.baseFlair_: As the sovereign, I must prepare the successor—his regimen must be severe, for his strength must be unparalleled. Upon ascension, none would dare to deny him his rightful place on the throne.
113541020.evoFlair_:
"You've so much kindness and love to share—it's just all pent up inside of you..."
—Tithi, Smiling
"I just don't understand... What kindness? What love?"
—Khawy, Shaken

706541010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 16 shadows, invoke this card, then lose 8 shadows.
When another allied follower attacks and deals damage to the enemy leader, if this follower hasn't attacked this turn, perform Necromancy (8): Evolve this follower.
706541010.baseFlair_: As the sovereign, I must prepare the successor—his regimen must be severe, for his strength must be unparalleled. Upon ascension, none would dare to deny him his rightful place on the throne.
706541010.evoFlair_:
"You've so much kindness and love to share—it's just all pent up inside of you..."
—Tithi, Smiling
"I just don't understand... What kindness? What love?"
—Khawy, Shaken

113541030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of an allied follower (excluding Lara, Soul Taker) that was destroyed during this turn into your hand. Change its cost to 0 and give it the following effect: Destroy this follower at the end of your turn.
113541030.baseFlair_: Their lingering regrets are what keep them so ripe! Fresh picked souls really are the best... Just look at them wriggle—they're so desperate to return to this world!
113541030.evoFlair_: Maybe I'll even get seconds! A cornucopia of flavorful souls, ripe for the picking! With this many choices, I've gotta try 'em all at least once!

115541020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if the selected follower had 4 defense or less before damage was dealt, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
115541020.baseFlair_: There are a lot more spirits around than people think. Look, there's one now. Haha, don't be scared. All the spirits are smiling at you.
115541020.evoFlair_: A medium's work is not much fun. Still, I want to save as many spirits as I can. That's always the first thing on my mind when I meet one.

900541010.baseFlair_: A speedy fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. It constantly hungers for the taste of souls.
900541010.evoFlair_: A high-velocity fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. Its fangs constantly glisten with fresh blood.

900541020.baseFlair_: A virulent fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. The poison in its stinger melts flesh and bone alike.
900541020.evoFlair_: A lethal fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. The poison in its stinger can melt even the purest soul.

900541030.baseFlair_: An armored fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. Its chitinous shell deflects the wishes of the living.
900541030.evoFlair_: An impervious fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. Its chitinous shell deflects the hopes of the living.

900541070.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
900541070.baseFlair_: A vengeful fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. Its sickle-like appendages are capable of cleaving even the hopes of the living.
900541070.evoFlair_: A slaying fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings.It sharpens its sickle-like appendages on the despair of the dead.

900541080.baseFlair_: A veiled fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. Not even the gods can see past its camouflage.
900541080.evoFlair_: An intangible fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. Its camouflage drives any unfortunate onlookers into madness.

900541090.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
900541090.baseFlair_: Fighting Is Real Scary... All I'm Good At Is Having A Hard Head. But, Aenea! It'll Be A-Okay! I'll Be Here For Ya, No Matter What!
900541090.evoFlair_: You always make me laugh... And when I cry, you always make me feel better. You're the best, Roly. —Aenea

100514020.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Necromancy (4): Summon a Lich.
100514020.baseFlair_: And now to a place deeper than any darkness you've ever known.

101524010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to an allied follower. That follower gains Last Words: Summon a Zombie.

116524010.baseEffect_:
Reanimate (10).
Give that follower Rush and the following effect: Banish this follower at the start of your next turn.

713524010.baseEffect_:
Reanimate (10).
Give that follower Rush and the following effect: Banish this follower at the start of your next turn.
713524010.baseFlair_: Lelouch vi Britannia commands you! Obey me, world!

101534010.baseEffect_:
Necromancy (1): Summon a Ghost.
Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
101534010.baseFlair_: The seductive calls of the ghosts tear apart the night and rend the living.

107513010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Summon 2 Skeletons.
Last Words: Reanimate (2)
107513010.baseFlair_: The ring sat still, cold as death. Yet, I reached out to touch it—anything to bring back my family.

113523010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, destroy a random allied follower and a random enemy follower.

104533010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a random Shadowcraft follower that costs less than your total number of play point orbs from your deck into play. Then destroy that follower.
104533010.baseFlair_: The fates of the living are ultimately decided by the words inscribed by Death.

100511050.baseFlair_: You intend to bury me? Forget it. The markings carved into my flesh grant me eternal life.
100511050.evoFlair_: Scorch my flesh and break my bones—still you cannot stop me. Isn't that wonderful?

101511080.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
101511080.baseFlair_: Virtuous souls and evil souls. They are both equally sweet to one who has no soul at all.
101511080.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
101511080.evoFlair_: The souls which float above battlefields are eaten up one by one. Once this demon consumes them, all traces of life are lost forever.

102511040.baseFlair_: A faceless apparition that commands the twilight. It feasts on death to gain strength.
102511040.evoFlair_: A savage phantom that commands the twilight. It reaps souls with its cruel scythe to increase the stores of the underworld.

106511010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
106511010.baseFlair_: Living's so bitter, so I'll kill you. I'll do it again and again, until you get bored of it. But don't worry—I don't bore so easily.
106511010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
106511010.evoFlair_: Living's so painful, so I'll kill you. I'll do it as many times as you want. Just say when you don't want to be killed anymore, okay? Although I guess you can't really talk when you're dead.

702511010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
702511010.baseFlair_: You know you cannot win, yet you persist... In that case, I shall fulfill my duty.
702511010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.

(This card will be treated as Dark Bladefiend.)
702511010.evoFlair_: "Thank you, Saber... You've saved me more times than I can count." —Master, Shirou Emiya

108511020.baseFlair_: The clatter of the scythe is a lonely god of death / The clatter of the scythe is the lonely god's behest —Provincial verse
108511020.evoFlair_: The lonely god of death sweeps his scythe / The lonely god of death has a new friend tonight —Provincial verse

109511010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Ghost.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Ghost.
109511010.baseFlair_: A life doesn't end at death. Prepare to be born again when your soul is finally liberated from this body.
109511010.evoFlair_: Control the spirits? Absolutely preposterous. I too, will be reborn one day... I don't know about you, but I plan to enjoy my second life.

110511010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
110511010.baseFlair_: Somewhere in the abyss of the underworld, he resides in a kingdom of fire. Clad in a flame capable of burning souls, he is well acquainted with the blaze that feasts on mortal life.
110511010.evoFlair_:
"This guy's flames burn the hottest... After Cerberus and me, of course!"
—Orthrus

111511030.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
111511030.baseFlair_:
Mrr-mm-mrph? Mm... mrr-mphr-mph?
(Where am I? A sarcophagus?
It's so cramped in here... I can't breathe...)
111511030.evoEffect_:
Storm.
(Can attack any enemy.)
Ignore Ward.
111511030.evoFlair_: Oh my god, thank you! I can't believe I totally spaced on my mission to protect the country! You're a lifesaver! Without you I'd never have remembered! Or gotten out of that cramped little tomb! Hehe! Meeting you was total kismet!

114511040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn summon 2 Ghosts, then remove this effect.
114511040.baseFlair_: Just before they died, the twins swore to each other they would do their best to remain together, even in the afterlife. That wish was granted in the most twisted way. But indeed, there is no space for anyone to come betwixt these two souls again.
114511040.evoFlair_:
Upon waking, the spirit, sensing the presence of her other half, sets out in pursuit. From dawn till dusk, she searches, crying, "Where can my older sister be?"
From dusk till dawn, almost the same voice cries, "Where has my younger sister gone?"

116511030.baseFlair_: Why, good morning! How are you feeling? Oh, how rude of me. I haven't introduced myself. I'm your murderer. And also your savior. And guess what? We're going to be buds from now on. Come on—let's shake on it!
116511030.evoFlair_: Stop sulking. Listen, you were sick anyway. Hanging to life by a thin thread. And if I hadn't been the one to kill you, I wouldn't have been able to revive you. Hey. I promise, everything's going to be fine. Being undead's not bad. Why? Well, because I'm around!

117511030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any allied amulets in play, evolve this follower.
117511030.baseFlair_: A treasure chest is like a door to the future. All that glitters within its confines will afford you a happier tomorrow, yet death can just as easily slam the lid closed. But who decides that outcome: the gods or something worse? —An Adventurer's Musings
117511030.evoFlair_:
It's not a box, per se, but a gateway: one that opens up to Amenta itself, and, once it slams shut behind you, will never let you leave. Don't bother trying to force the door open either; you'll know if it wants you to go through.
—An Adventurer's Musings

101521060.baseFlair_: Mmm... Delicious! There's nothing tastier than a soul that's been marinated in darkness. Once you've tasted one, nothing else can satisfy!
101521060.evoFlair_: This soul's pretty tasty too, but it's lacking a certain... richness. Maybe I didn't inflict enough pain on its owner? Heh-heh-heh!

101521080.baseFlair_: It's so... cold... It hurts... Please give me some warmth... Give me your soul... Your toasty, fresh dead soul...
101521080.evoFlair_: Ahhh... Warm souls... The cracks of my broken heart, filled... The warmth is spreading... Yes... Yes! It is time to seek more souls!

101521100.baseFlair_: A ghost of a knight who continues to charge across the battlefield despite having lost his life long ago. Night after night his trusty steed neighs as he raises his blade, ready for another assault.
101521100.evoFlair_: Consumed by an envy of all those who've retained their heads, the ghostly knight continues his frenzy of decapitation. Bringing terror wherever he goes, it is little wonder he is known as the harbinger of doom.

102521010.baseFlair_: Only the dead can cross the River Styx. You can't go any further.
102521010.evoFlair_: You really want to cross, don't you? Since you're so eager, I suppose I'll help you die.

104521040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and gain +2/+2.
104521040.baseFlair_: This one feeds on souls to grow, so fear not. You'll serve as my nourishment in death.
104521040.evoFlair_: Not enough... Not nearly enough. No offering so meager could ever satisfy me, so hand over your soul.

106521030.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
106521030.baseFlair_: A carrion bird that feeds on souls. It dives into the underworld and relishes the taste of wandering spirits.
106521030.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
106521030.evoFlair_: A carrion bird that swoops down on the battlefield to feed on souls. It favors the sweet taste of souls formed in riotous chaos.

112521020.baseFlair_: It began as a cadaver that was damaged to the point of being useless, but when we combined it with a machine it suddenly started to move. Thanks to this discovery, we will have countless more tools at our disposal. —Necromancer's Report, Part 2
112521020.evoFlair_: I cannot stop laughing. Technology can be used to supplement countless numbers of souls. I'd like to see just how many cadavers I can command with the power of that strange machine. —Necromancer's Account, Part 2

102531010.baseFlair_: Life and death, beauty and ugliness... I control them all. They all belong to me!
102531010.evoFlair_: I'm the only one who matters. All others are nothing more than my thralls... And you'll soon be just one more of my playthings.

105531020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all other allied Shadowcraft followers. Restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of other allied Shadowcraft followers.
105531020.baseFlair_: Lost young lady, I'd be happy to help. Let me show you warmth in the frigid night. Reach out your hand and take mine.
105531020.evoFlair_: Poor young lady, your loyalty to wishes and illusions is admirable. You've answered my questions well, so I'll return you home by the light.

110531030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Infernal Crown or Descent into Madness into your hand.
110531030.baseFlair_:
The crow's domain is death and darkness. Drop by drop, the bright serum of life pools in its crown. That gleaming ichor can make dead men dance or drive the living to madness.
—Chapter 3, Encyclopedia of Demonic Harbingers
110531030.evoFlair_:
Life's bright ichor drips from the crown. Caught in the empty vessel of a dead man, it fills the void and makes him dance. But caught in the vessel of a living man, it floods the soul and drives him mad.
—Chapter 4, Encyclopedia of Demonic Harbingers

114531020.baseEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Last Words: Give a random allied Naterran Great Tree Last Words - Summon an Immortal Elephant.
114531020.baseFlair_: The ground shakes. The massive, immortal elephant trumpets its battle cry. "Today's giant elephant vs human battle was another smashing success. The spectral beast circus has a devoted following. Rebirth can mean finding a whole new way of life."
114531020.evoFlair_:
The immortal elephant rises no matter how often it is struck down, to the thunderous applause of the audience.
"That elephant—Paono—is a real pro. So intelligent! And there's plenty of things he can do that the living couldn't. Being reborn can really expand a performer's repertoire!"

101541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
101541010.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
101541010.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

701541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
701541010.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
701541010.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

704541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
704541010.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
704541010.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

107541010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (10) - Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain Storm.
107541010.baseFlair_: As long as my reign is true, you shall face death—a fitting fate for any trespasser of my domain. Repent to that person and beg for forgiveness.
107541010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
107541010.evoFlair_: For tainting our pride, don't think for an instant you'll be able to make it out of here alive. Wander for eternity with that person.

110541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound and a Coco, Left Paw Hellhound.
110541010.baseFlair_:
"Woof! You're a funny lookin' playmate!"
"Woof! Just right, if you ask me!"
"You ready? 'Cuz we're just itchin' to go at it with ya!"
110541010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied followers Last Words - Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
110541010.evoFlair_:
Charon: Heh... How cute. I wouldn't get so cocky if I were you.
Orthrus: You're in for it now—my sister's flames are the fiercest in the underworld!

112541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put an Eternal Vow into your hand.
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
112541010.baseFlair_: This is far from the first time, but... if you're willing to pledge your eternity to me, I will gladly embrace you. So close your eyes. Only for a moment though; we will be together forever soon enough.
112541010.evoEffect_:
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
112541010.evoFlair_: Till death do us part? Don't expect me to be satisfied by such a trite turn of phrase. Swear to me. Swear that you'll love me forever, even after death...

114541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. Summon a Necrofauna.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, summon a Necrofauna.
114541010.baseFlair_:
Animal spirits gather round to hear her tales.
"There's so much to see and do in this world—who could be satisfied with a single lifespan? But you can keep on going if you want. That's the miracle of rebirth."
114541010.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, summon a Necrofauna.
114541010.evoFlair_:
A kind voice beckons. Animal spirits flock to its owner.
"The world is so vast, many souls get lost after returning. Will you all come with me to find them? We need to let them know what a miraculous gift their rebirth is."

116541030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Summon a Nightmare Devourer. Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Gain 2 shadows.
116541030.baseFlair_: Why come back from the dead? To once again taste the sweetness of sleep. So is the nature of the spectral baku. It wanders in an eternal dream—dragging in those from the outside that would try to disturb it, leaving halcyon silence in its wake.
116541030.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Gain 2 shadows.
116541030.evoFlair_:
Hey, beast. Sorry, but I can't accept these terms. You want to know my policy? It's this: I'll sleep when I'm alive. Keeps the soul burning. Don't get it? Here, let me play you a number: "Midday Death Napper."
—He Who Once Rocked

117541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Burial Rite (2) - Reanimate (X) and Reanimate (Y). X and Y equal 6 split randomly.
(To perform Burial Rite (2), there must be at least 2 open spaces in your area after this follower comes into play.)
Enhance (9): Do not perform Burial Rite. Evolve this follower instead.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
Last Words: Draw 2 cards.
117541010.baseFlair_:
Holy vows is what we wanted. Right, darling?
We are The Lovers, enjoying mutual affection.
It's always in our heart to stay together till the end.
Embrace me, darling. You won't have to go it alone.
117541010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, destroy 6 other random followers. Then, if the enemy leader has 7 defense or more, deal damage to them until their defense drops to 6.
117541010.evoFlair_:
Matrimony is what we desired. True, my dear.
We are The Lovers, enjoying lustful temptation.
But should we split, we'll share love with many others.
Speak to me, dear. What kind of love do you desire?

113514010.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Skeletons.
Deal damage to an enemy follower equal to the number of allied Skeletons in play.
113514010.baseFlair_: The delusions of the departed—a perfect weapon for the living.

107534010.baseEffect_:
Reanimate (X)
X equals your current turn number.
107534010.baseFlair_: Inflated with souls, one day the cyclone will consume its final soul upon reaching nirvana, and all will become one.

116534010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Luna's Game or Aenea's Friendship.
Necromancy (4): Instead Reanimate (4), Reanimate (2), Reanimate (1), restore 4 defense to your leader, and put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
116534010.baseFlair_: A chance encounter brought together two souls. Friendship gave life to courage, and courage blossomed into hope. Maybe the meeting wasn't accidental; maybe it was fated all long. "I can fight. I'm not alone anymore, and that makes me strong!"

900534020.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
Necromancy (20): Deal 10 damage instead.
900534020.baseFlair_:
Cycle as does life; bite as does the serpent.
Reversal of providence, the bonds' inner workings.
Not am I now but the miracle's reversal.

900544030.baseFlair_: Use my knowledge to live for an eternity. —Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter

900512010.baseEffect_:
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Lich and a Zombie.
900512010.baseFlair_: One does not cling to life without first grasping fear.

900512020.baseEffect_:
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Draw 2 cards. Restore 2 defense to your leader. Gain 2 shadows.
900512020.baseFlair_: If you really want the gold, you musn't be afraid to be a little reckless.

100511060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Give Ward to a random allied follower.
100511060.baseFlair_: Once upon a time, a knight fell in love. He sacrificed everything to protect the object of his affections: money, status, reputation—even his own life.
100511060.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Give Ward to a random allied follower.
100511060.evoFlair_: Night after night the pitiable cavalier who fell in love with a fairy prowls the forest. But the object of his affections is no more. She does not even exist in his memory.

104511030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Give Bane to a random allied follower.
104511030.baseFlair_: If you want to take lives, you have to be the ebon itself. You need to embrace the darkness in your heart and sharpen the barbs of your every murderous impulse.
104511030.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Give Bane to a random allied follower.
104511030.evoFlair_: A truly ebon heart is free of any corrupting influences, and it drinks even the blood that spurts out of victims. So be ever-diligent in your quest to extinguish lives.

101521070.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
101521070.baseFlair_: Do not fear death. Your souls are my lifeblood. They will live on forever within me.
101521070.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
101521070.evoFlair_: Death is calling you—inviting you towards eternity. Come, give yourself to it. Allow me to drink deeply of your soul.

117521010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (4)
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Cloistered Sacristan.
----------
Ward.
117521010.baseFlair_: Heed the Three of Wands, guideposts of empathy. May their sympathies help you overcome the stalemate of purgatory. Walk forward with confidence; the wands mark the way.
117521010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Burial Rite - Restore 3 defense to your leader.
117521010.evoFlair_: I oversee the dead; my pact is with this cemetery. Our bonds can't be severed even in death—much is learned from a pile of corpses. Death is a part of us, and we are part of death. Neither is more important than the other.

101531040.baseFlair_: By the time you notice the rotten smell, it is too late. You are already inside the dead dragon's stomach.
101531040.evoFlair_: The dragon never stops eating, and yet its hunger refuses to be sated. The meat it devours slips out of the gaps between its bones and falls upon the ground. The dragon thereupon slurps it up once more and emits a howl of greed.

103531020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
103531020.baseFlair_: I am Balor. To behold my eyes is to face calamity most dire!
103531020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
103531020.evoFlair_: With these eyes I'll transform this battlefield into a hell on earth! Those who face me will shed tears of blood until they perish!

105531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an enemy Odette, White Swan. Then evolve this follower.
105531010.baseFlair_: Only you can alter my fate—only you, dear. Please save me from this world of darkness; please kiss me.
105531010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
105531010.evoFlair_: Is white the same as goodness? No, white is the color of the void—of utter meaninglessness. Please choose me. I promise to embrace your love and let it infuse me.

107531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Skeleton Knight.
Last Words: Summon a Skeleton.
107531020.baseFlair_: Don't you know who my father is? Get on the ground and show some respect!
107531020.evoFlair_: The life of a prince is dreadfully boring sometimes. You came just in time, I was looking for a distraction... You'll be begging for mercy when I'm done with you!

110531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random 5-play point Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
110531010.baseFlair_: I don't enjoy fighting, but guiding lost souls is my duty. So allow me to guide you, lost one... to the fiery depths of the underworld.
110531010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Necromancy (5) - Subtract 5 from the cost of a Shadowcraft follower in your hand until the end of the turn.
110531010.evoFlair_:
Cerberus: Ooh... I just got a chill down my spine.
Orthrus: Charon is terrifying when she's angry!

108541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Eternal Potion or Instant Potion into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
108541010.baseFlair_: Moment after moment makes an eternity. Insight upon insight makes omniscience. Not yet but some day, I'll surpass every living soul and become my true self.
108541010.evoFlair_: You'd be more useful as my pawn than as a fool. So, listen, fool. Your life's already mine!

117541030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 random followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys, Goddess of Amenta) from your deck into play and destroy them.
Enhance (10): Then, if allied followers that originally cost 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 play points have been destroyed, win the match.
117541030.baseFlair_: The goddess of the underworld has another name: Nebet-Het. Dare not slander death. Dare not disparage death. When the lamentations of the living reach her ears, the world will brim with joy.
117541030.evoFlair_: The last rites act as a warm send-off for those who have reached the end of the line. The goddess of Amenta awaits, ready to lift all burdens from the soul. Rejoice in your final moments. From now on there will be no more pain.

101534030.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Zombies.
Necromancy (6): Give +0/+1 and Ward to allied Zombies.
101534030.baseFlair_: Look, there's your mother on the right, then your father, and then your little brother on the left. Wait, or was it the other way around?

900544050.baseEffect_: Subtract 2 from the cost of all Shadowcraft cards in your hand.
900544050.baseFlair_:
A fleeting moment of intimacy.
Or perhaps the bitter start of eternity.
Regardless of the outcome, you will share it with her.

900533010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, if this card's Countdown is at 3, Reanimate (8). If it's at 2, Reanimate (10). If it's at 1, Reanimate (12).
900533010.baseFlair_:
The dead are but empty vessels.
Crude, earthen cups drained by the god of death.
Pour, then! Fill the vessel and make it dance.

101511070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
101511070.baseFlair_: Those who are dead and who envy the living, imbue my scythe with your resentment! Let us hunt together!
101511070.evoFlair_: Do you suffer? Do you hate? Are you filled with bitterness? Then follow me! Let us stain the moon red with blood!

101511100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Restore 4 defense to your leader.
101511100.baseFlair_: What is death? Death is nourishment. It is our nourishment as a god of death.
101511100.evoFlair_: If we move our fingers to weave their fate, the weak become our prey in a matter of moments. Heh-heh, consider yourself lucky that I'm full right now.

105511020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and summon a Tin Soldier.
105511020.baseFlair_: Do you have business with a mad hatter? I brought one man's hat right with me, but nothing for young ladies unfortunately.
105511020.evoFlair_: Days like these are the best, miss. That's doubly true for the world you're from! Just give it some thought. You don't want to make any regrets.

100521030.baseFlair_: Kingdoms fall, palaces crumble, entire populations perish. And yet true royalty always prevails.
100521030.evoFlair_: Your king has returned and must be praised! We have cheated death, achieved immortality, and returned to the world of the living! Now come, my subjects! It is time to rebuild our kingdom!

103521040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play and then restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
103521040.baseFlair_: We are guardians of the dead in the service of Nephthys, goddess of Amenta. We bring death to those who disturb the sleep of the departed, and send them to the underworld.
103521040.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play and then restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
103521040.evoFlair_: Vile grave-robbers, you've blasphemed against the dead, so your fates are sealed! Prepare to be judged by the goddess of Amenta!

107521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
107521020.baseFlair_: These scales dictate the fate of souls by measuring the weight of their sins. Will you put yours to the test?
107521020.evoFlair_: The guardian of the scales dons the mask of a beast, never erring in judgment. Today, the scale shifts the feather of truth towards the heavens once again.

113521010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Put a random 3-play point follower and a random 1-play point follower from your deck into play.
113521010.baseFlair_:
As a shaman, her duties include relieving successors to the throne of pain and stress—with her sweet, sweet embraces and coddling.
"Just let me heal you with all my love! Huff... Puff..."
113521010.evoFlair_:
"Behave yourself... Not in front of everyone."
—Aisha

"Ngh... Such strength... I... Urk!"
—Khawy

108531010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 6 shadows, Necromancy (6) - Choose: Summon a Spellplate Cavalier or Bone Cavalier.
108531010.baseFlair_: If you insist, then fine—I'll bring your boyfriend back to life. A brave knight of few words? Hahaha, he must have been so charming.
108531010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve all allied Spellplate Cavaliers and Bone Cavaliers.
108531010.evoFlair_: Oh, I'm sorry. He was just so charming that I had to make him my own. But see! Don't you think he looks better with me?

111531020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put a Shadowcraft follower (excluding Gluttonous Empress) that costs X play points or less from your deck into play, then destroy that follower. X equals your total number of play point orbs.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
111531020.baseFlair_: Excuse me, is this the banquet hall? I heard there was going to be a feast. Oh, please. Don't go to any trouble on my account. All you have to do is stay reeeal still for me...
111531020.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
111531020.evoFlair_: To me, the best part of the feast isn't the souls. It's the flesh of my plump and succulent fellow demons... The bones of my wretched compatriots. That's what makes me salivate. I don't have an invitation... but I know I can depend on your hospitality.

102541010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the following: Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
102541010.baseFlair_: A noble lord of the underworld, served by grotesque vermin that devour any who would harm their master.
102541010.evoEffect_: At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the following: Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
102541010.evoFlair_: Seated upon a mountain of skulls, the lord calmly partakes of his meal. There's no hurry. After all, the souls of the underworld are countless.

104541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Summon a Zombie. Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +2/+0 and Rush until the end of the turn.
104541020.baseFlair_: The sun rose and set a hundred times before we finally managed to take that fiend's head. It looked like the nightmare had finally ended—until the god of the underworld aided our nemesis. —Chapter 4, Notes on Gods and Demons
104541020.evoFlair_: The nethergod returned him to life as a headless horseman, and he sped away into the dark. So it falls upon us to prepare for the next war, when he will surely haunt us again. —Chapter 19, Notes on Gods and Demons

105541010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Banish all allied Shadowcraft cards in play and summon a Dark Alice. At the start of your next turn, banish all Shadowcraft cards in your hand and your deck.
105541010.baseFlair_: Lands of wonders, lands of marvels! Anything you wish for will come true! I was born because that's what you wished for, Alice.
105541010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Banish all allied Shadowcraft cards in play and summon an unevolved Dark Alice. At the start of your next turn, banish all Shadowcraft cards in your hand and your deck.
105541010.evoFlair_: If the world changes, I'll have to change too. Isn't that scary to think about? I don't want the world to change, and I don't want to change either. So I'm going to stay an illusion.

106541020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add X to this follower's attack. X equals the number of allied followers destroyed during this match.
106541020.baseFlair_: A cage of life or perhaps a literal living hell, this undying armor harbors tens of thousands of souls. It is a supernatural being that extends its life by feeding on death. —Demonic Recollections, Chapter 6
106541020.evoFlair_: It shines with animus; it radiates malice. Behind its breastplate, indignation melds with despair as souls swirl in a stygian eddy that surpasses the pits of hell. —Demonic Recollections, Chapter 7

108541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 10 Skeletons into your hand.
At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
108541020.baseFlair_: Beyond the land's end. Beyond the world's end. Beyond the netherworld's end. It lurks outside all perception. One need only to wait patiently for it.
108541020.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
108541020.evoFlair_: Shrouded away in a mist of souls, it cannot be seen. Is it only one? Are there two or more? When it finally springs into action, the world may well end.

108541030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a follower that originally costs 3 play points or less, destroy that follower and summon X Ghosts. X equals the original cost of that follower. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
108541030.baseFlair_: Ah, welcome, and thank you for coming! Our theater is exquisitely stimulating. Life dances here, and death sings. The curtain's about to rise on a tale to surpass your imagination.
108541030.evoFlair_: Is this a comedy of hatred, or a tragedy of anomie? That's for you to decide. Now please sit back, relax, and enjoy the show.

112541030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if any other allied Machina followers are in play, deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Otherwise, deal 4 damage to all other followers.
112541030.baseFlair_: The corpses wriggled and moved, fusing together and growing in size. The consumed became one with its gruesome form as bitter tears streamed down their faces. The mountainous mass of bone and machinery roared as it wreaked its havoc. —Necromancer's Report, Part 3
112541030.evoFlair_: That was fascinating. I never dreamed it was possible to control so many bones at once. It feels as though machines were made to be used by necromancers. Now then... There's not a soul left in this town, so I suppose it's time to find a new audience to feed my magic.

900541100.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
900541100.baseFlair_: In the grip of his hands is the great equalizer of purgatory—the blade demands veneration from all who would behold the manifestation of darkness itself.
900541100.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
900541100.evoFlair_: The bringer of death incarnate usurps the light from all creation. No lightning shall ever be permitted to strike before him. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

115541030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (10)
Can't be destroyed or banished by effects. (Can be destroyed by Countdown.)
Whenever an allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost and subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Arcus, Soulful Manager.
----------
Can't be destroyed or banished by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
At the end of your turn, change this follower's attack and defense to X/X. X equals your current turn number.
115541030.baseFlair_: A symphony of screams—a performance to curdle the blood and stand each hair on end! No need to be shy! Come right up to the stage! This play was written especially for you—I'm certain you'll enjoy it!
115541030.evoFlair_: Why, whatever is the matter? You've gone quite pale. The actors look familiar, you say? Well, of course they do. They're all the people you've killed. A comeuppance makes for a satisfying ending, don't you agree? Now! Time for the climax!

106534010.baseEffect_: Destroy all enemy followers with 4 defense or less.
106534010.baseFlair_: Cold, heavy, oppressive. The mist and death are rather alike. —Death's Dirge, Chapter 5

113534010.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, summon Zombies until your area is full.
Enhance (9): Randomly put different Shadowcraft followers from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
113534010.baseFlair_:
"Shorthanded? Perhaps I could be of assistance."
—Arcus, Ghostly Manager

115523010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Reanimate (7).
During your turn, whenever an allied follower is summoned using Reanimate, perform Necromancy (4): Give it Storm.
115523010.baseFlair_:
"Hey, quit shovin', pup!"
"Get in line, or I'll ruff you up!"
"If you can't follow the rules, you won't get into Hades!"
—Cerberus, Hound of Hades

109533010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Transform all followers in play into Zombies.
Whenever a follower (excluding Zombies) comes into play, transform it into a Zombie.
109533010.baseFlair_: A miracle, it's a miracle! My bedridden mother, she's walking! In fact, she's doing so well that she's even biting! —Optimistic Young Man

101521090.baseFlair_: Okay, hand it over. No, not your money! That stuff tastes awful. It's your soul I'm hungry for.
101521090.evoFlair_: No matter how many souls I eat, I never get full. I've got to find someone with a bigger soul. You might be a good start.

106521020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 3 Skeletons.
At the end of your turn, give a random enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn if there are at least 4 allied followers in play.
106521020.baseFlair_: Toying with life and trampling over the dignity of death. It is such a unique merit of the art that I could just cry—hey now, don't move a muscle unless you want to end up like these little ones.
106521020.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give a random enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn if there are at least 4 allied followers in play.
106521020.evoFlair_: Unable to rest and bound for eternity—these little ones must resent me. But it's something you come to expect. Great necromancers live alongside resentment, after all.

111521030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Draw a card.
Burial Rite: Draw 2 cards instead.
----------
Ambush.
111521030.baseFlair_: Its touch is ineluctable, yet indiscernible. Death is always by your side—always watching, always caressing.
111521030.evoFlair_: Notice it. Flee from it. You will always find death by your side—surely following you with a smile.

114521010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied follower. Draw 2 cards.
----------
Rush.
114521010.baseFlair_: Smear my name if you wish. Hate me all you want. Who cares how heavy my soul weighs in the balance? That voice in my head keeps chanting, "Fight. Win. Mow them down." If you want to stop me, be ready to wager your soul on the venture.
114521010.evoFlair_: I'm perfectly satisfied with what I have now. I don't need peace in the afterlife. What possible interest would there be in existing as a spirit bereft of flesh? I only feel alive when I'm swinging this blade anyhow.

900521010.baseFlair_: Seeking after power, hunting after power, the giant offers up its reason and howls madly. In its eyes no trace of a mind can be found. In its hands no trace of mercy can be seen.
900521010.evoFlair_: Once the giant abandoned its humanity, nothing was left but a path of carnage. Unable to reflect on its actions or even shed tears of regret, it can only writhe. It can only howl.

900521020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
900521020.baseFlair_: Seeking after power, hunting after power, the skeleton vows to the past and screams. In its eyes the old light is gone, but in its hands a trace of the old light remains.
900521020.evoFlair_: Once the skeleton abandoned its humanity, nothing was left but readiness for annihilation. Separated from its dear ideals and any resemblance of its former appearance, it clings to a sword that shimmers meaninglessly.

101531050.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Mordecai the Duelist.
101531050.baseFlair_: He seeks a never-ending duel to make his bloodless body burn with passion again.
101531050.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Mordecai the Duelist.
101531050.evoFlair_: He trains for an eternal duel to satisfy the cravings of his fleshless body.

104531030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Wights.
Last Words: Put a Wight King into your hand and change its cost to 0.
104531030.baseFlair_: We are a cortege of corpses, and we will reign eternal. Even if my bones turn to dust, a new thane will follow.
104531030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Wight King into your hand and change its cost to 0.
104531030.evoFlair_: I envy the living for their warmth, and I covet their pulse, but I shall not ask you to give these things to me. I only ask that you relinquish them and join us.

107531010.baseFlair_: I never wished for such a power. I never wished to see this one reduced to bones. But alas, I was born a necromancer—that's what I do.
107531010.evoFlair_: To reduce this dragon to bones, and wrest it from slumber... It's much too tragic. But alas, I am a necromancer—that's my destiny.

112531010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (12): Reanimate (X), Reanimate (Y), and Reanimate (Z).
X, Y, and Z equal 12 split randomly.
112531010.baseFlair_: Mere cadavers fetch a small price. Vessels without contents only last around five minutes after all.
112531010.evoFlair_: It doesn't matter if the vessel still has its organs. There are things more important than flesh, you see.

101541030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Add its attack and defense to this follower's attack and defense.
101541030.baseFlair_: A death god from the underworld who acquired the dead body of a demon king. She has offered countless souls to revive him as her loyal retainer.
101541030.evoFlair_: The underworld death god hunted the souls of the living and offered them to her demon king. At last she has revived him as her puppet.

103541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys) from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
103541010.baseFlair_: A goddess sits upon her throne near the entrance to Amenta, considering how to judge those who enter. She is feared by the living as the face of their demise but worshipped by the dead as the guardian of their souls.
103541010.evoFlair_: Do not fear me, living one, for I mean you no harm. I only wish to give you the supreme gift, that of sweet oblivion. Let me wash away your melancholy and free your spirit from the agony of life.

703541010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys) from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
703541010.baseFlair_: A goddess sits upon her throne near the entrance to Amenta, considering how to judge those who enter. She is feared by the living as the face of their demise but worshipped by the dead as the guardian of their souls.
703541010.evoFlair_: Do not fear me, living one, for I mean you no harm. I only wish to give you the supreme gift, that of sweet oblivion. Let me wash away your melancholy and free your spirit from the agony of life.

107541020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +3/+0.
Strike: If this follower has at least 10 attack, destroy this follower.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
107541020.baseFlair_: I have death in the grip of my hand. With a trace of magic, the pieces will be in place. Manmade immortality... Man will play god on this day! Finally, my wish will... —A Sorcerer's Journal
107541020.evoEffect_:
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +3/+0.
Strike: If this follower has at least 10 attack, destroy this follower.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
107541020.evoFlair_:
Why are they such fools? Humans trying to play god—death cannot be controlled, for in the end...
—Chasing Immortality, Chapter 3

117541020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: When you perform Burial Rite, if it is your fifth, seventh, or ninth time this match, invoke this card, then return it to your hand.
----------
When this follower leaves play, or at the end of your turn, summon a Lich. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
117541020.baseFlair_:
Do not call to him. Do not glorify him. Do not follow him. The spirits that flock in his wake do so well enough. He is a lord with no vassals, charging into battle to hold service for the departed.
—Chronicle of the Dreadlord, Preface
117541020.evoFlair_:
The dead worship at his feet while the living cower in fear. Never have I seen such a well-preserved corpse. O lord of release, your rage has brought us sweet salvation.
—Scribbles Found in Chronicle of the Dreadlord

900541060.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Reanimate (X)
X equals the number of shadows you have.
900541060.baseFlair_: A horror birthed from the blackest abyss. It devours any who are foolish enough to venture into its lair, claiming his or her words, memories, and appearance for itself.
900541060.evoFlair_: It returns to the human world donning the appearance and personality of those it's devoured, attempting to assimilate its victim's former life. This mimicry is its primary method of catching new prey.

110524010.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Skeletons. Give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Necromancy (4): Give +2/+2 to all allied followers instead.
110524010.baseFlair_: Malice penetrates the marrow. Even when flesh rots away, animosity remains forever trapped in bone.

102521020.baseFlair_: Andras is an embodiment of silence. When he appears in our world, drawn by screams, he brings death to those unlucky enough to be caught in his path.
102521020.evoFlair_: Andras is a harbinger of the icy darkness. All touched by his blade of frost are doomed to spend eternity as statues.

117531010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Transform a random enemy follower into a Skeleton.
----------
At the end of your turn, destroy 2 random enemy followers and restore 5 defense to your leader.
117531010.baseFlair_: Here comes Death, riding in to compel transition. Passing on becomes easier after realizing the uncertain nature of life. With a swing of his scythe, all shall submit to the law of change.
117531010.evoFlair_: Death is inevitable. Death does not discriminate. Death is inescapable. All who stand before his hooves receive the same fate.

101541020.baseEffect_:
If 4 allied cards are in play, this follower costs 9 less play points.
----------
Fanfare: If 4 other allied cards are in play, destroy all other allied cards.
101541020.baseFlair_: When the gate to the Dead World is opened, the lost lord will be reborn. Humanity and heaven will bear the cost.
101541020.evoFlair_: The lord's flesh has been smeared with the unclean blood of corpses from the underworld, but his sword continues to gleam as it has for millennia, ready to be wielded against the ranks of the living.

111541020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (X) - Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the defense of the enemy follower with the highest defense in play.
111541020.baseFlair_: The hero slew the wyrm, but not its obsession. Its malice was stronger than death. Though its heart rotted away, venomous avarice still pumped through its veins, dragging the wyrm back to tortured consciousness.
111541020.evoFlair_: Oozing resentment. Awash in greed. Poison billows from between its rotting jaws as its tongue lolls out in mindless lust for Hreidmar's gold. The hero who pierced its heart is no more. Wallowing in its own evil, the wyrm raises a gurgling, impotent roar.

115541010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a One-Tailed Fox.
Accelerate (5): Summon 3 One-Tailed Foxes.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 4 One-Tailed Foxes.
Whenever an allied One-Tailed Fox comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Drain.
115541010.baseFlair_: Ahh, the sound of the clamoring crowd is sweet. What's a play without an audience? Is it any wonder how much we demons all love humans? To the end of the procession and beyond.
115541010.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied One-Tailed Fox comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Drain.
115541010.evoFlair_: We live within a strange story. Life is fleeting, mortals the flickering figures in a shadow play. Is it not odd? Cast your dice or dance your fill, but do so before dawn. To the end of the procession and beyond.

900541140.baseFlair_: Once I slept below the turf. Now I rock out on stage. Lucky I spent my time in the bowels of hades though, 'cause now my riffs are metal as hell. Rise, my dead heads. Get out of your dirt beds. 'Cause I've got a banging new song for you: "Undead Riot."
900541140.evoFlair_: The baku crawls into the space between life and death, snuffling for dreams to eat. It hears a soul-rousing note—the song of the dead, pulsing with life. The creature squeezes its eyes shut and laments, "Back to sleeep." Thus the struggle between silence and sound begins.

109541020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Evolve this follower.
Evolve this follower if it was summoned using Reanimate.
109541020.baseFlair_: The oath and flames were once separated by death. No tears to douse the flame, no method to deliver the oath. A wandering blade teaches for eternity, seeking an immortal enemy. Once again, his duel begins.
109541020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.
109541020.evoFlair_: If this were a story, it would have already reached the ending. If this were a song, the performance would have finished. However, this is his life—a reality that continues without end. And once again, his duel begins.

116541020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon 3 Assembly Droids and put a 9-play point He Who Once Rocked (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Ward.
Last Words: Reanimate (8).
116541020.baseFlair_: Once I slept below the turf. Now I rock out on stage. Lucky I spent my time in the bowels of hades though, 'cause now my riffs are metal as hell. Rise, my dead heads. Get out of your dirt beds. 'Cause I've got a banging new song for you: "Undead Riot."
116541020.evoFlair_: The baku crawls into the space between life and death, snuffling for dreams to eat. It hears a soul-rousing note—the song of the dead, pulsing with life. The creature squeezes its eyes shut and laments, "Back to sleeep." Thus the struggle between silence and sound begins.

111541030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Tartarus, the Tormentor. Then destroy it and put a Lurker in the Dark into your hand.
----------
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, destroy all enemy followers with 5 or less defense.
111541030.baseFlair_: "Even heroes can starve..." "Shall I sing you a lullaby?" "Pray, fool! And repent under the lash!" "You're hilarious!" "Hey... Why are you so sad?" "What's your name?" "If you wanna be friends, you gotta act like it!"
111541030.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, destroy all enemy followers with 5 or less defense.
111541030.evoFlair_: "What strange weather we've been having." "Whaddya wanna do tomorrow?" "There's... this one person I can't stop thinking about." "Did you just bite me!" "The world must face judgment." "Ahh, I'm so booored..." "I just want a little bit. Do you mind?"

113541010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (6): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Summon a Path to Purgatory. Put a 7-play point Hades, Father of Purgatory (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
113541010.baseFlair_: In the grip of his hands is the great equalizer of purgatory—the blade demands veneration from all who would behold the manifestation of darkness itself.
113541010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
113541010.evoFlair_: The bringer of death incarnate usurps the light from all creation. No lightning shall ever be permitted to strike before him. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.
